Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2019
Author: kimcramer98
Title: Absorbent AND Soft
Body: I bought these towels because I was desperate to find something both my boyfriend and I would like. I have very absorbent towels, but he always says they’re too scratchy. However, I always felt his towels were too plush and almost didn’t absorb any water at all. I bought these in hopes we’d find a compromise. I washed them first, like the directions stated, warm water, tumble dry low, no fabric softener or dryer sheets, separate from other items. I used one and thought, “Oh no! This is very absorbent! My boyfriend will probably think they aren’t soft enough!” (I am easy to please about softness.) He used one and I braced for impact....and....He LOVED them! He thought they were just the right amount of softness, and I didn’t think they were too plush. They are perfect. I have them in four colors. We replaced all of our towels with these. Good quality and have kept their bright colors after many washes. Would recommend to anyone and everyone.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2020
Author: Melody
Title: The BEST towels you will EVER use!!!!!
Body: I was hesitant buying towels on amazon as I like to buy them in store at bed bath &beyond so that I can feel them. I was also concerned that these would be the kind of towels that shed all over your body when drying off, especially since I bought these in black. Lastly, I was concerned if it would be thick enough and good quality. I received these two days ago and washed them before using. I figured I’d have to wash these a few times for them not to shed on me. Wow!!! I can’t say enough about how perfect these towels are!!! I’m VERY picky(if you hadn’t noticed). These blew my expectations out of the water!! I used for the first time this morning and could not believe fantastic these are!! First, they are SO soft and fluffy and they feel much thicker than they look! Fantastic quality (so far). These are incredibly absorbant and dry very quickly. And as to the shedding, I really couldn’t believe it! These towels after only one wash hardly shed AT ALL!!! The amount they did was minimal and I can tell shedding should be completely non existent after a few more uses. These are the best (that I can remember) towels I’ve ever bought. After using these once, I doubt I’ll go back to other towels. Also, the hand towel is great because it had NO shed AND it dries so fast, you don’t have to worry about a damp hand towel after washing your hands a few times!!! I suggest these for anyone, but especially for the picky people like myself! You will not be disappointed! (If this changes after having these for a few months, I will update, but I don’t see that happening)
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2017
Author: donna taylor
Title: Best morning towels
Body: I love this towel set. Because I love to start my days always amazing when I am taking a shower and using towels. This towel set is really luxurious!! They are large enough to wrap my whole body in comfortably with overlap leaving no huge uncovered gaps. I have been using these bath towels almost one month every morning. I was buying my towels from retail stores until now. When I compare the price and quality between Amazon and retail stores, Amazon is definitely BEST.They are made of 100% genuine Turkish cotton. They are very soft and fluffy. I ordered the Turquoise Blue and it is a very pretty shade. I love that they came in a bundle of six. This gives me plenty of comfy towels to use. I would definitely recommend these towels if you like a luxury feeling right out of your shower each morning. If I have any issue, I will update my honest review.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2019
Author: Melissa
Title: Description on Amazon/Label are lies.
Body: The description of this product on Amazon says Organic so when I received the towels and there was no “organic” on the label I became concerned. Since they’ve listed OEKO-TEX on the label, I went to the OEKO-TEX website where you can search by manufacturer for certified manufacturers or you can search by the label number. Neither the Manufacturer - American Soft Linen - or the label number came up. These towels are definitely not organic and not certified by OEKO-TEX (an organization that certifies green manufacturing/fabrication process).I will be returning these towels.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Don't Trust Your First Impression!
Body: I regret not taking a photo when I first pulled these out of the box, and perhaps a photo of the disappointment on my face when I took them out of the plastic bag that they were packaged in. They were thin, they were lifeless, and my initial impression was that they may have been manufactured from cardboard. I fell into a mild depression as I realized that the bulk of my order, the bath towels, and hand towels hadn't even been delivered yet, and I already had buyer's remorse.HOWEVER....that's right... keep reading!!They came with a nice little card that explained to wash them first, then tumble dry low. I washed them with a basic Tide pod, no fabric softer. That last part of those instructions had me a little confused though. My dryer has a setting that specifically says "Towels" and when I pressed that button, it automatically selects high heat. I decided to take a chance, and try something new. I chose a timed dry on low heat. No dryer sheets either.I came back later and opened the dryer to find the most beautiful, fluffy, and soft washcloths I have ever seen or touched!! I am so happy with these, and I'm super excited for the rest of my order to arrive :)
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2016
Author: Austin
Title: The Best Towels!!!!
Body: These towels are perfect. After twice washing, these towels are still in good condition and as soft as how I used them the first time. Also, they are not only so lightweight but also absorbing of these towels is amazing. And it still has the same softness after using. The white color is also gorgeous. These towels would be a great gift. It feels like I am in a five-star hotels' spa in my bathroom.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2018
Author: tanya
Title: Soft, Absorbent & WAY better than the box store... SUPER VALUE
Body: I bought these towels because I had gotten tickets to take my son to Cedar point & then their water park the following day ... my current towels were ragged & I didn't want to look like a hobo lol.Towels are expensive and so I try to get the best bang for my buck (who doesn't), so I figured I would try these...Long story short... first day at Cedar point my face got horribly sun burnt. So once at the hotel the first thing I did was wash my face from a day of sweating... it was like a horror movie using their washcloth on my face! It HURT soooo bad! (Ironically they had a sign up in the bathroom saying if you took a wash cloth it was $2 and $9 for snagging a towel that I wouldn't give 2 cents for).Anyway lucky for me we brought these towels for the park! They saved my flesh!! SO much softer!!  I did not use the hotel towels except for a bath mat & they didn't even work for that. I have to add they are very absorbent which I was worried about with them being thin... I also have well water which is rough on towels & these are doing much better than the ones I got at W-mart about a month ago... (I don't use fabric softener on towels even with my hard water & these are STILL softer & more absorbent than the torture towels at the hotel)Some reason I can only upload one pic right now, but I took a pic I will add to show the W-mart ones in comparison... they may look similar BUT way different! W-Mart ones are being converted to rags as they are useless and falling apart. These ones have already been washed several times (everyone is looking for the "new towels" and doesn't stay in the towel closet a day before getting used lol)
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2016
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great towels
Body: This is a really really nice towels set! I am super excited to now have a matching set of towels! Everything seems to be of good size. The large towels are large enough the  hand towel size and the small towels are perfect face rags!These are simply gorgeous! My grandmother always had white hand towels in her bathrooms (she just wanted to prove she could keep them white!). They wash so nice and are so soft. Truly elegant! Do recommend these!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2018
Author: A. VH
Title: Disappointed, do not buy!
Body: Disasspointed with the quality of this towel. Definitely not worth the price. I have received the towel with one of the big ones has already stained, I contacted the seller but no reply at all so I decided to keep it and wash all of them. I only have the small ones for display and the big ones won't even absorb any water, not at all. My husband has to use our old towel to dry himself off, what a waste.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2019
Author: Casey
Title: Soft and pretty!
Body: I was nervous to buy towels online (not able to feel them and see the color). I got white so can’t really go wrong there. They are super pretty in my bathroom. Make sure you wash first! There is a strong smell and when drying it removes excess fibers so they come out really soft. Good for the price too.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2020
Author: Royl
Title: Quality seems to have diminished
Body: I buy these towels for my airbnb. The first few orders I've made I felt the quality. However this batch I can there is a difference in quality. It feels like there is less material stic5ched or something. I'm not sure but it's not the same. In the photo is my previous order of towels. U can see the stitching seems to be tighter. The new one is the front one. The stitching seems to be more spread out. My previous order of towels are definitely heavier than this current order.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
Author: Kat
Title: Definitely recommend these towels
Body: I really like these towels. I ordered these and another set from a different company because I wasn’t sure what I was going to get. These are so soft!  The color is very bright. We’ve had them since October and they haven’t faded. Not a lot of fuzz or pills.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2016
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: The BEST Towels I've Ever Bought !
Body: If you want a bath towel that has everything you want: great absorbancy, comfy softness and durability, this is the choice for you. I've bought other nice quality towels, but had never tried Turkish cotton until now and I'm now sold for life - best towels I've ever purchased and I LOVE them.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2020
Author: Mike
Title: Won’t buy again. Waste of money
Body: Yes these are soft towels, but as far as absorbency they did that ok. The size is small on the bath towels. My problem is I washed them as instructed to. The towels had so much lint in them they plug up the lint filter on my high efficiency dryer. Didn’t think much of it the first time, but I have used them and  washed them now three times since getting them and each time they plugged up the lint filter and cover my other towels and clothing with lint. Now there are strings coming apart in them already. I won’t buy these ever again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2018
Author: Denise
Title: Faded after only 2 weeks
Body: Within 2 weeks, these faded spots showed up. I've never had anything like this with other towels. We never use bleach either.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2019
Author: Twin mom
Title: Slightly more blue
Body: Great towels. They’re slightly more blue teal than the image shows which luckily is exactly what I needed but just so you’re aware!! (Viewing from an iPhone with standard screen warmth)
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2021
Author: Christina Maioli
Title: Happy With my Purchase
Body: Ok, so I am the type of shopper that reads all of the bad reviews first, so I can see if there is a recurring theme that matches any of the concerns I might have. After reading the bad reviews, I was hesitant because the amount of lint and shedding seemed to be mentioned frequently.  However, I took a leap and order the towels that I wanted. I followed the instructions about the first washing and yes... there was a lot of lint the first wash. Considerably less the second wash and I imagine the amount will continue to decrease with additional use/washes.  The softness and size is exactly what I hoped for.  The towels are thick and the quality is excellent.  If the lint from the first 2 washes is a concern of yours... I personally believe the positives far outweigh the negatives for this product. Also, I have never purchased a brand new towel that did not shed extra lint the first couple of washes. I purchased dark colored towels and the color is exactly the same after 2 washes with no fading. The only reason it has 4 stars instead of 5 is because the thickness of the towel makes it a bit heavy and slow to dry after use.  A very minor trade off for the size and softness. If the amount of lint doesn't decrease or if this becomes a problem with fibers transferring onto my body during use. I will update my review.  As of now, I am happy with my purchase.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2020
Author: Aubrey E. Ingalls
Title: Softness and value
Body: The towel set is great and the price was reasonable.  I received a postcard saying I could get 10% off my next order so I ordered another set and some extra washcloths but did not see the reduction shown when I checked out so I'm not sure when the discount gets applied.  I would recommend these towels, etc. for their softness and value.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2020
Author: Ken
Title: Very absorbent
Body: The yellow color really catches your eye, but what I like most is the absorbency,  and it feels fluffy on my skin, even after a couple of washings. Its heavy enough too. I wish I had a better camera just to show how bright they still are.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2020
Author: Steve
Title: Washing them resulted in a color change
Body: After the first few washes, we did not notice any problems.  It is important to note, we do not use any type of bleach when we wash.  We use Tide pods 3 in one:  detergent, stain removal, and color protector.  On the third or fourth washing, the grey started turning an orange-red color in various areas and it has progressively gotten worse.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2020
Author: Vinny C
Title: Not too thin, or too soft
Body: Now if your like me you don’t want a wash cloth that’s too thin that you can’t get a good wash, but not too thick, and it has to have a little roughness in the fabric so you can scrub your face and body. I found this to be the happy medium out of the other wash clothes I’ve found on here.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2019
Author: CE JONES
Title: Not what I expected from the description
Body: These towels are barely adequate.  The loft is a bit too soft for me and doesn't feel like 100% cotton but rather more like a synthetic.  Curiously, the washcloths stained immediately in an odd grey circle in the middle.  Since I only use Dove body wash, I'm not sure what caused the stain.  I tried everything including soaking in bleach and Oxyclean to remove the stain but to no avail.  I would not buy these again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2020
Author: Valerie Lynch
Title: The shed!
Body: Unfortunately, I've had an experience different from most reviewers.  I'm on my 4th washing of the towels (yellow, red, & blue).  They have to be washed separately because they are not color safe in warm water (at least the red & blue towels, not sure about the yellow), and they produce amazing amounts of loose fibers that fill the filter of our dryer and cling to other items.  In fact, I run the towels through the dryer at least twice to remove as many fibers as possible.  Today my husband vacuumed each towel prior to washing in an attempt to remove as many fibers as possible.  Don't know if that will work.On the positive side, the towels are soft, and the colors are vibrant.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
Author: Sarah
Title: Soft, bright YELLOW YUMMY COLOR!
Body: Made in Turkey, YAAS! I Love the way they feel! Very absorbent yellow is so happy! I ordered 2 of these sets and 2 big towels! Colors all matched! Larger towels have a lower thread fluffy but still feel so Awesome and absorb extremely well! I am 6ft tall and have been use to the smaller towels now spoiled by the large! My guests will enjoy the regular sized ones but I am using the bigger ones.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2018
Author: GrannyD
Title: Soft!
Body: These towels are beautiful, ample size and wash nicely.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2020
Author: PqP
Title: Oozing oodles of black paint
Body: I bought the 4 washcloths, color black.Started using the first one. Soaked it in water and started washing myself with it. I started turning black at the areas touched by the washcloth! I squeezed all the water out of it. What came out wasn't clear water, it was a deep black liquid, sort of what a squid or octapus would spray you with.Right now, these 4 cloths are in my washer, all by their lonely selves -- I wouldn't dare put them in with the other wash, everything would turn black. Hope they (1) lose all that excess ink, and (2) still look decent color-wise.Imagine, wasting an entire washing machine worth of water -- twice! wash then rinse -- in order to make these things usable.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2018
Author: PD.
Title: These towels are very nice and good quality
Body: These towels are very nice and good quality.  The fabric is just right, not too thick and not too thin and the quality of the workmanship is very nice.  I am using them as decorative towels in my bathroom.  I love the bright color, adds a nice touch to my bathroom colors. I would definitely buy again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2020
Author: Jamie H
Title: WOW, get these!
Body: Wow, these washrags look like something you would use at a 5 star hotel! Big, plush, soft, thick, these wash rags are all the things you could dream of. Don't hesitate, these are so worth the  money. Will absolutely buy again!
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Pistachio Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2021
Author: SuzieCee
Title: Absorbent. Thick. Soft. Luscious.
Body: Although there is little negative I could say about the American Soft Linen 40x80 super towel that I recently purchased I am a little puzzled. I bought the bath sheet based on a previous purchase of the washcloths which are exceptional thick, thirsty, and luscious. My question is, "What happened to the pile?". The pile is different on the bath sheet than that of the washcloths. Were these towels made by the same manufacturer? On the washcloths the pile is longer. On the bath sheet it is shorter and not as luscious. What happened? Yes, the bath sheet is HUGE, weighty, buttery soft, and very quality. I just expected the loft to be similar on the two products. No stars off. It IS a decadent quality towel. You will want to get in it after a scrumptious bath! If you are referring to the images the first depicts the pile on the bath sheet. The second shows the pile on the washcloths. The third shows the two side by side. The forth relays an idea of the size of the bath sheet as it lays over the doors of my shower stall. American Soft Linen makes nice affordable towels. You won't regret your purchase.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
Author: JRS
Title: Softer than expected
Body: I looked at towels at Bed Bath & Beyond but was dismayed at their prices - even on sale.  So - I looked on Amazon and read A LOT of reviews.  These towels seemed worth the risk based on reviews and I was not disappointed.  They did not shed a lot of lint during the first wash and they have remained soft through numerous washings thus far.  I was going for soft more so than absorbency.....I get the correlation between the 2.  For the price, these towels are a good buy and provided what I wanted.....softness.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2020
Author: Jonathan C. Holewa
Title: Very Absorbent!
Body: Overall I love these towels!  I got the yellow and the colors are very vibrant and they're also absorb water well - which considering that is their main purpose, they get an A+ on that front.Only downside and something you'll want to consider initially is that there is a lot of lint the first few uses that will come off on your body.  I did wash and dry these before using them, but I would suggest washing and drawing these towel at least twice before using them just be sure all the errant fibers are removed.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2020
Author: LBP
Title: Nice quality but burgundy color stains
Body: I’m updating this review based on the burgundy wash cloth set I bought. I have previously purchased this brand in a peach shade and also a medium tone blue. I was very pleased with quality and softness. My issue with the burgundy is that the COLOR BLEEDS HORRIBLY. After receiving this item, and knowing red dye can stain, I soaked these cloths in a tub of cold water. Only a slight amount of red color was found in the water, so I washed them in machine in cold water. However, I’m consistently finding that when a used damp cloth of the burgundy red color is tossed into laundry hamper, it leaves red stain on everything it touches. So, for this reason, I can not recommend this product.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
Author: RedheadSC
Title: Stop searching for the perfect towels ~ Ta-Dah! FOUND!!!
Body: Can't say enough good things about this linen/towel company and the Turkish, 100% cotton cloths they produce.I had been looking for months and months for all the qualities this product possesses and finally, after trying several other companies, I hit the jackpot!!Very thick, soft and gentle on the skin (no shedding, extremely absorbent).I'm red-head with very fair skin, and use the washcloths to wash my face 2, sometimes 3x a day.I purchased the 4 pc. washcloth set 3 different times in less than a week (1-dk grey, 2 bright white) and will be ordering all the towels soon!In addition, 3 family members and 6 friends have purchased all the various bath sets, too!So heads-up: better hurry if you want a wonderful product- we might purchase all of them- and send them into a back-order status!!!Good luck! :)
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2021
Author: christopher simmons
Title: This Towel Set is High Quality
Body: Overview:This towel set is comfortable, absorbent, and high quality. I really believe I made a great purchase.PROS:- The towels are very absorbent, and that is great since I take multiple showers a day.- It looks like the manufacturer took their time in creating an amazing product.- I like how the color doesn't dilute after washing them.CONS:Make sure to wash the towels at least twice as some of the cotton will rub off on your skin during your first use. This is normal.Recommend:I would recommend this product.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2021
Author: KSR
Title: Great Towels
Body: I looked around forever to find some towels to match the glass tiles in my shower and finally found these! They come in a plethora of colors, and the teal color was a great match for my tiles. The towels are soft, with loft, and are just the right thickness. They are the softest thick towels I've ever used! I washed the towels before using, as advised.  After the first wash, they were not as absorbent as I hoped. After three washes, they are now what I would consider absorbent.  I'm hoping the next couple of washes will open up the threads even more for a perfect level of absorbency.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Title: Good Quality and Good Value
Body: Love these towels so much I ordered another set. soft and they don't fade when they are in hot water,the color is exactly like the description on the site was happy with the price of course
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2020
Author: Ataturk
Title: the spouse ordered these, i told the spouse, you did good
Body: the spouse ordered these, i told the spouse, you did good. these towels are made in turkey with turkey grown cotton fibers and so, you know wholesomeness went into the product. the colonial blue the spouse choose is a beautiful subdued muted teal. meaning, not as bright or vibrant. a classy color. i will wash them up and use them well. so far, i recommend. if we're disappointed in the future by the less than quality wear of this product, i will update. otherwise, you can assume, we are happy.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2020
Author: Paris Hammond
Title: Lint everywhere
Body: These towels are frustrating to say the least! I am 3 washes in and will not use them until the lint stops because I do not want it all over myself and bathroom. I have cleaned my lint trap 4xs, swept my floors and had to clean my washing machine between each wash due to lint being plugged up in every freaking drain hole. Literally EVERYWHERE, do not bother-anyone giving a good review is probably covered in lint and in denial. I will update when it ends if it ever does. But paying more than I did for the towel to get it user ready is ridiculous.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2018
Author: Paul Edwards
Title: Five Stars
Body: Qualiy
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2021
Author: kc
Title: so soft, but took a while to get rid of the fuzz
Body: There are just what I was looking for, I wanted thicker, soft towels and they are lovely. The yellow is pretty, it is very happy and sunshiny. My bathroom doesn't have a window so this was my way of brightening it up a bit. The towels exceeded my expectations, very absorbent soft and thick. I think they even dry faster then my previous thick towels. The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is the extra time it took to eliminate the lint/fuzz these generated at first. It says to wash first, of course I did but I still had yellow fuzz everywhere. I had to wash them 3 times and run them through full dryer cycles 4-5 times before I got rid of it all. Otherwise, amazing towels. Maybe just plan on extra washes before use.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
Author: Kyle Anthony Smith
Title: Not worth it.
Body: Very disappointed with these towels. I waited 1 month to write this review - to make sure what I am saying was valid. 1. SO much dye in these towels, I washed them about 10x before the dye stopped ringing out in the shower.2. After the first wash and dry in my machines (low delicate wash & dry) the towels looked like I've owned them for about a year. I didn't like how used they looked after only one cycle! The point of buying new towels is that they look new for awhile... So, POOR POOR QUALITY!3. The colors are not the same in person. Online the purple color looks a lot darker/deeper. In person, the purple is very bright and almost neon.4. Coming apart. These towels are very quick to come apart and snag, I've had them for almost a month and they have been snagging on everything.Overall, I've spent about $120 with this brand buying all different sizes of their towels and it was a waste for all of the above reasons and I read the reviews for hours before purchasing, I hope this helps make your decision to shop elsewhere.The only good things, they are large, soft and very thick but that's not enough to chose this brand.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2021
Author: Steve T
Title: A really good towel
Body: A decade ago, I purchased a big box top of the line towel that lasted (even until now).  It just kept naturally wearing thin due to repeated use and washing.  I went back a couple of years ago and got the exact same towel - but it was not the same quality, and the area where the banding is "shriveled."  I was not impressed.  I kept using the original purchase until it was time for new.I found these towels and was impressed at how great they are.  While larger than my previous towels, they are equally if not more absorbent, soft and luxurious feeling.There may be better brands out there (in softness, absorbancy, size, quality or any combination of these).  However, I don't need to look any further as I am totally satisfied with this towel.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
Author: R
Title: The best towels!!!!
Body: I ordered four of these In all different colors. They’re amazing towels! The colors are bright, they’re so soft and they fit all the way around me (I am fluffy with a big bust) these towels I can wrap all the way around me and still have room! I am buying more of these! These are my new favorite towels my kids want to have some too they now think that their towels aren’t soft anymore.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
Author: Mamma99
Title: Buy these!!!
Body: These are the most amazing towels I’ve ever used. They are extremely thick, fluffy and soft. We have been searching for towels like this for years. In the attached picture that is only two towels on the left and then the matching wash clothes and hand towels. I washed multiple times as the instructions recommended. I highly recommend - these will not disappoint.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2021
Author: Mary W.
Title: Soft, absorbent and pretty.
Body: I did a lot of research in Egyptian vs Turkish cotton; I chose Turkish cotton.It is not a heavy thick towel, but that is not what I want.  I have some thick towels that always stay damp and take my dryer forever to dry.  This is fluffy, soft, pretty, big and absorbent, can't ask much more of a towel.They were much better looking after I washed them.  I did not get that much lent and I did not get lint on me when I used them.I would buy them again. I  would give as a gift if they had the design on both ends.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2020
Author: b-kozi
Title: Generously sized
Body: This is a generously sized bath towel - definitely covers head to toe. I would have liked a little more absorbency and with that said it is a dryer towel so it is not soft, but not scratchy either. For the value I think I would look for something a bit more absorbent and softer.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Nice towel, but
Body: The towels are thick and soft and absorbent.  I washed them first like the instructions recommended.  There was so much lint in my washer, I had to run another rinse cycle to clean it out.  When I ran them through my dryer, I had to empty the lint catch twice.  The next wash was considerably better, but I'm glad I didn't wash them with any other items.  I do like the towels, but to start with they are messy.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2020
Author: Nate
Title: Deserves 0 Stars They Suck worse towels you will ever use Lint for days
Body: Waited a few months to leave a review so I could test these towels. To see if the issues they have would leave but they did not. Here is my 100% Straight up truth Don't Bye Them!!!*Cons- Washed them with rest of my clothes and left an amount of lint I have never seen on all my clothes- The lint is so small it even gets on your skin and you can not see it- It gets in your intimate areas- Impossible to scrub off- Worse then dog hair getting stuck to your clothes- Price is not worth it at all over priced and they suck- Cheaply made- Advertisement video lies they are truly some of the worse towels ever that my skin has touched- Lint left over all over the whole house and bed sheets- Ugh such a mess going to take weeks and so many lint rollers to take this off*Pros- Soft- Pretty color
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Highly recommend
Body: We've been looking for affordable, turkish towels for quite awhile.  I ordered the first two on a fluke (needed a dark green bath towel for the holidays).  We were shocked.  It was so soft, so absorbent that I went back and ordered two sets for everyday.  After those arrived with the same quality product, we ordered two more sets along with bath sheets.  We  could not be happier.  The start soft and do indeed get softer with each additional washing.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2021
Author: D. Seeley
Title: Fluffy towels but shed a lot
Body: Towels are very fluffy and absorbent, but they initially shed - a lot. I washed the towels before use as recommended but during the drying cycle, I ended up cleaning the lint trap twice due to the amount of lint that was given off.  Even following this I still have black lint on my face and body following use. I expect that this will diminish after a few washes, but be prepared for a lot of shedding initially.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2020
Author: SHWilson
Title: Surprised
Body: I thought these towels would be just OK, only ordered one set. Boy was I wrong. They came compact, like they were shrink wrapped and thin. I washed them and dried them. They are so soft and absorbent. I am impressed and will be ordering more. The price was right and the texture excellent. Glad I found these!
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
Author: lisa j
Title: Awesome, thick, beefy towels in BOLD unfading colors
Body: Such soft, beefy, thick, cottony towels. Best deal I've seen. Just be careful because the color is exactly what it shows on the description. Anotherwords, this is a BOLD yellow, almost neon, not a mild lemon yellow or pastel. This is also a VERY solid color dye job. I wash it in the hottest water and it never fades. I just simple adore these beefy thick absorbent towels. Love the bold colors they offer,too, and plan to order more in other colors as I change my bathroom decor seasonally.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2020
Author: Nathalie
Title: IT’S PERFECTLY “H U G E !”
Body: Haven’t used it yet so I can’t review absorbency however it’s good quality!! The size is fantastic!! Bigger than a pretty big beach towel! I’m 5’1 wrapped under arms goes down to ankles and it wraps around me twice and I’m not a tiny... I am very happy with this towel! Has a strong odor of what reminds me of crazy glue lol would wash B4 use regardless but just saying...
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2021
Author: Julie Dog Mom
Title: LOVE!
Body: These are beautiful towels! The yellow is very bright, just what I wanted. It is the third set I have purchased, (two from other companies) and the others don't even come close in softness and thickness. If they had the colors I need I would buy more.

Title: Good quality at a reasonable price.
Body: These were nice, quality towels. Good thickness, plush but not so plush that they don't absorb. I washed them once before usage as instructed, and was very pleased that there was no lint left all over me after drying when I got out of the shower. Very absorbent.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Burgundy Red

Author: Andrea Cole
Title: Perfect for a bigger person
Body: We order one for a gift and it was so nice and huge in size that I ordered 2 more for us. It goes around my body and half way around again, and I am a bigger gal! Very nice size and quality. Highly recommend purchasing and follow directions to wash a couple times to remove loose fluff that comes on all new towels.

Title: We love everything about these towels

Title: LOVE THESE TOWELS!

Style: Size: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2021
Author: P. Dickerson
Title: Plush, vibrant color and soft.
Body: These towels are really beautiful and a great value. I ordered the yellow and couldn’t be more pleased with the rich color, how thick and plush they are and the softness. I washed them on regular cycle and dried them. They came out looking even better then when they arrived. They are so soft ...and I didn’t even use any softener nor a dryer sheet. There was a minimal amount of lint in the dryer. Nothing more then is my usual experience with any other new towels I have purchased in the past... and I always buy quality towels. I would buy these towels again in a heartbeat...and I’m pretty discerning when it comes to towels.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2021
Author: Nancy H.
Title: Treat Yourself
Body: I ordered these towels after reading reviews. The multiple color choices fit my need to update my bathrooms. I ordered a couple of sets, followed the company’s pre-wash instructions, and started using the towels. I was thrilled with this purchase. I ordered  several more sets without hesitation. The fluffy and soft texture continues to impress me and everyone who uses the towels. Guests comment on the beauty and luxurious feel.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
Author: Heather
Title: Great buy for the price.
Body: I washed them per instructions (cold, gently cycle, no fabric softener) and dried on delicate.There was certainly a lot of lint in the trap the first round, but the towels fluffed up well, and the husband didn't have a single complaint. I've continued washing the towels on cold without fabric softener because that's how I wash all my towels, and haven't had an issue with anything more than normal lint in the trap, and no lint after showers.I will buy more of this brand.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2021
Author: James or Linda Hunter
Title: Soft, absorbent and great colors.
Body: It took me forever to order towels online because it’s hard to tell if they are soft/absorbent but I’m so glad I ordered them! They are both soft and absorbent and they come in colors I like. I bought these sage green and liked them so much I ordered another set in purple. Wash them first as they direct you to do and they fluff right up.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2020
Author: sandra t.
Title: Hard to find the perfect linens.
Body: When I first received the linens they appeared very thin and pressed. I wasn’t really happy with them. Then I did my laundry which included the linens. They puffed up so much I could not believe they were in the same linens. I love them. Perfect color and perfect absorbency. Never before have I found such nice towels, wash clothes, and hand towels. Perfect to say the least.

Author: Catherine R.
Title: Fantastic towel
Body: I wanted a bigger towel, and wow 2 people could wrap up in this towel...It is made very well, and i love it.  I wrap myself up and i drip dry, i never towel dry off..i always drip dry.The towel absorbs the moisture but never feels wet...i love this towel!!!!

Author: Kelley Heegard
Title: Awesome Towel!
Body: Woah!!  So much bigger than I expected.  These are great for the bigger guys in my home.  Thick and well made.  Wash before using, they have a funky smell when you open the bag.  I 100% will buy again.  I bought the Navy Blue and Teal colored ones.  Getting a black one next.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2017
Author: Ricardo Martinez
Title: five-star quality
Body: Towels are honestly awesome. Softness gives you a great feel. Color is as described on the site. They have a five-star quality. Towel sizes are very useful. Bath towels are not too big or too small. I am using them very well after shower.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2021
Author: Allison
Title: Great buy!
Body: I normally like buying towels in person so I can get a feel for the texture, softness, and weight before committing, but... covid. So last summer I decided to take a chance, and I ordered two 3-towel sets (washcloth, hand towel, bath towel) in Grey and Colonial Blue.The colors are great, although the Colonial Blue has a little more green in it than what you see online, and one slight bummer is that the 2 sets were not the same texture. (The Grey is a softer texture, and the Colonial Blue - while still soft - was a more closely woven texture.) The other bummer was that the bath towels seemed small... I blame my husband for this, as he introduced me to bath sheets a couple years ago and subsequently ruined normal-sized towels for me.After months of using puny bath towels, I'd had enough. It was time for an upgrade! I bought 2 of these jumbo bath towels and I'm so happy I did!I was a little concerned when they first arrived, because the Colonial Blue one looked greener than the previous set and I thought it wouldn't match. I figured I'd just throw caution to the wind and wash it anyway, hoping that would help, and thankfully it did. They came out of the dryer super soft and fluffy, and the colors matched perfectly.I've had no issues with lint after the first wash ( I always add some white vinegar when washing towels), but I have noticed they start to get "linty" when they need to be washed again. Aside from that though, these towels are amazing and I love them!
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2020
Author: Katie Mendenhall
Title: Blue lint EVERYWHERE
Body: I was so excited for these towels. When I first used them, they were perfect. I could wrap them around me twice. It felt amazing.But then as I wiped off there was blue lint EVERYWHERE. Some bigger pieces and then that annoying “dusting!” I washed them again and same thing. My bathroom and toilet are brand new and it is literally dusted with blue lint. It’s everywhere.Love the size of the towels. They are super soft. But so not worth the mess it leaves behind. Washed three times now and still lint everywhere. Time to throw away 😔
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2019
Author: Alex
Title: Endless Lint
Body: ENDLESS. LINT!I am 6-7 washes in, and the lint is out of control. I'm convinced these towels will eventually just disintegrate into mush.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
Author: Stef
Title: My husband love's his new wash cloths
Body: We have been buying our bath linens from Costco for years. In the past few years, these products have declined in quality so we decided to try something new. The wash cloths we got from American Soft Linen are soft and absorbent. Be sure and follow the manufacturer's directions and wash all linens before use.We plan to order some bath towels from this company after a few months as I want to see how the wash cloths hold up.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Quality towels.
Body: Although I've only had these for a couple of weeks,  so far I am very pleased with them. I like that they are light weight and yet very absorbent, unlike the towels we had prior, which were very absorbent,  but very heavy (very bulky in the washer and dryer and took forever to dry). I purchased Navy Blue and, as to be expected, they do shed some in the first few washes. The only reason I gave them a 4 star rating is because I dont know how well they will hold up in the long run, as far as color and absorbency. But, I'm guessing it will be very well.Also, FYI - The Navy blue is a bright Navy (pretty), not a soldier blueor denim navy.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2020
Author: K-Mom
Title: Super soft towels good value for the dollar
Body: I purchased these as guest towels. I washed them prior to use and they seem to have held up nicely. They didn’t fill the lint trap after drying. They still look nice after 2 washes. Good value for the dollar. My only disappointment is that they are called “American Soft Linen” but the are imported from Turkey! The name is a bit misleading although their origin is listed in the fine print.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Title: Ok

Author: Linda Vaganov
Title: The Color of the towel bleeds horribly at first
Body: The color of this towel bleeds horribly at first. Before usingI I washed the towel four times then on two consecutive days let the towel in water all day snd washed it again and still the color bled. I used almost an entire box of the “Shout Color Catcher” to measure the color still coming off the towel before I used it.  Other than this, the towel is everything it claims to be.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Turquoise Blue

Author: Clarita
Title: The color does bleed because it is burgundy but as we know red most always does. Think plush
Body: I loved the color and the plushness, plus it is long enough to fit around a normal figure. I have a question and the person wanted to know how long it would bleed, with that I rightfully could not answer because it may always bleed. Use Color Catcher and it will not fade on other towels.I would definitely buy again because they are are quality towels.

Title: Soft and fluffy

The lint shed in the initial wash/dry of the towels was moderate.  The subsequent washing/drying of the towels showed a significant decrease in the lint.  The color has not faded and the towels are very soft and fluffy.  I was so impressed with the quality of the towel set that I ordered  additional towels.

Author: Jewell
Title: Luxurious, Thick, and Soft!!
Body: I was hesitant to order these towels after just returning a set from another company, but am so happy I did! I followed the instructions about prewashing and then drying on LOW heat. Author: G
Title: Complete TRASH
Body: This towel is NOT absorbent. At all. It smears the water over your body while simultaneously covering you in black lint. After a couple of washes, the edges started fraying and threads started coming out all over it. It's complete garbage. I would NOT recommend this to anyone.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great towel set
Body: Wow.... They say don't judge the towels until you have washed them.  When I opened them up they were soft from the start. I  washed them 2 times and there was quite a bit of lint . I changed my lint out every 10 to 15 minutes and it was thick several times.  After they were completely dry they were thicker than they started. Author: Cindy t
Title: Quality differences between colors
Body: So I have a question if anyone else has experienced the same thing.  I bought the 6 piece set in black and the hand towels only set in white.  I did exactly as it said and washed before using.  I washed each separately and dried on low.  The white ones came out as fluffy and soft as they were when they arrived in the package.  The black ones however, even after washing the same way, came out rough.  I even washed them a second time and used air dry to see if they fluffed out but no luck still the same.  Is this just a bad batch? I see great reviews on the dark colored sets. Not sure if I should return for a replacement or just stick it out 😑UPDATE: I returned them and found Sonoma towels at kohl’s are perfect.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2020
Author: ForeverYOUNG
Title: 6 piece turkish cotton towel sets
Body: UPDATE BELOW....I purchased 2 sets...  These are listed as "turkish cotton."  They are what I would call in my personal opinion a medium weight.  They are soft.  I haven't washed them yet - but I never hesitate to update my reviews should new info seem useful.  I chose white.  They are a nice, bright white.  They are stylish with the braid strips.  The bath towels are are normal size - wish they offered a set with a bath sheet size.  I also purchased additional wash cloths.  After having a very disappointing previous order with "spa like turkish cotton" towels only to have them arrive with bright pepto bismal pink elephants on them - I was really nervous to try a different set.  I cringed as I opened the box... NOT TO WORRY.  Nice, stylish, UGLY LOGO FREE towels!!  I just remodeled my bathroom and thought a new set of nice, luxury towels would be nice.  These, so far, fit the bill.  They arrived quickly (I have prime) and in great shape with some other items I had ordered.  Will update if anything changes after washing.UPDATE  11/7/2020.... Ok. I have now washed and dried these... yes there was dryer lint... but not overly so.  They are new.  There's gonna be lint.  After having said that, I feel very confident about my 5 star review.  In fact, I went back and ordered 4 larger size bath towels. These towels are weighty.. soft and richer feeling that I was expecting after washing and drying.  No threads - appear to be well sewn.  I like the stylish braids as I said in my original review. I am hoping these towels hold up for the long term - and I will continue to update my reviews should new info seem useful.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021

Title: Love these towels!

Hopefully this will end with the next wash but overall I love these towels and am very happy with my purchase. Would definitely recommend.UPDATE: I have washed these towels several more times and there is still a huge amount of lint in the dryer screen each time. But they are soft and absorbent and I love them, we'll see how long they last.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2021
Author: Noone
Title: Unfriendly black towels with relentless, prodigious lint-making ability.
Body: These black towels continually shed large lint balls when handled (removing from dryer, folding or hanging on towel bars, and during actual use); floors end up seeming to be covered with black bug bodies.  Both sides of the towels have had firmly-attached pills since initial laundering (making them far less soft) and quickly appeared old and worn.  The washer drum is covered with wet black lint when the towels are removed, and the dryer's lint trap is thickly packed even after multiple washings.  A chic color and the allure of thickness are not sufficient to compensate for having to pick lint balls off hair and body (hoping you find them all!) and vacuum the bathroom floor after towel use, or for having to wipe out the washer before doing a different load.  The set I purchased has been discarded, but left behind lint ball stragglers in hidden places to haunt the unwary by wafting out when least expected.  Evidently, you cannot get them all by wiping or suction -  or, they divide to conquer.  (Let's not even think about replication at night.)  Please be advised:  these towels are not for the faint of heart.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2020
Author: J. Myers
Title: OMG!!!! FUZZ EVERYWHERE ALL THE TIME!!!
Body: I have made a special point of reviewing these towels now after having purchased them some time ago, due to the frustration continually encountered when using them prior to getting ready in the morning.This morning was the straw that broke the camel's back.FUZZ EVERYWHERE!!!!Yes, I've washed them. I've dried them. I've washed them again. It seems to make no difference!!!!After using these towels, I spend so much unnecessary time picking towel fuzz and lint off my face, both directly after washing, and after applying my makeup. They just won't go away!!!Of course, I purchased the black towels, so the fuzz/lint looks like stubble.For this reason alone, these towels are the worst I've ever purchased and are becoming the bane of my morning existence.If you want your houseguests to stay only briefly, put these towels in your guest bathroom.For Pete's Sake! Don't even buy them for washing your car! What a disaster that'd be!The dog would even balk at being dried off with these things...Mopping up unexpected appliance floods, perhaps? No! Not even that! They're not even all that absorbant.For the life of me, I can't figure out why these are labeled "luxury" or the #1 Bestseller in towels.Word to the wise: Look elsewhere or spend all of your time looking at how much towel fuzz has adhered itself to your skin!!!!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2021
Author: bogart
Title: BUYER BEWARE! See photos & Read facts! Save $$$
Body: After washing these towels alone, 5 times in cold water and 2 color catcher sheets each load, these towels still bled color, filled the lint screen each wash PLUS shed all over my body after a shower (washing 5times prior). Everything I wash is black and this has never happened (in decades). The insert that arrived with the towels claim to be BSCI and OEKO-TEK compliant and after entering the info on each website, BOTH said this did NOT exist. Attempting to refund but not allowed to print the label and drop at USPS.UPDATE: added a star due to getting a full refund
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Author: Senior Chief
Title: Thirsty and Soft! Go for it!
Body: These are the softness and thirstiest towels I’ve owned. They suck water up better that a shop vac!The Malibu Peach color is deep and rich and works spectacularly with my coastal decor!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2020
Author: Claire M.
Title: Do not buy these towels
Body: Worst. Towel. Ever. Do not buy these towels before reading the 1 star reviews. I bought these towels based on the large number of 5 stars without checking the 1 star reviews.  My mistake.  I must have received very different towels than those 5 star reviewers. First, they smelled strongly of chemicals. So strongly, I could smell them while wrapped in plastic and before I ever opened the shipping box. In spite of the smell, I liked the color which was just what I wanted. I washed them per the instructions in warm water, Gain detergent with no bleach of any kind and dried them on low heat. The towels were very soft when I took them out of the dryer but they looked like the color had faded. I thought it was my imagination. It was not. When I hung one of the bath towels, I noticed what looked like tan splotches on the towel. Hoping it was the lighting I took the towel into bright light and realized the dye had faded and left tan splotches on both bath towels. I then read the 1 star reviews and learned this was a fairly common problem. I’m returning the towels and will go on the hunt for better quality towels.  Buyer beware.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2020
Author: ROCKIN' ROBIN
Title: Blue Blizzard, a blue dryer drum, blue water
Body: The towels are pretty, feel soft, nice thickness. I washed then dried. I clean out my drier filter and the hands full of blue lint, the size of a gerbil. Take a towel and snap it a blue blizzard and it sticks to everything. I haven't used them yet as I don't wanna come out the shower liking like Sulley from the movie "Monsters, Inc". So I'll wash them again and again till the lint trap doesn't clog.UPDATE: I've washed and rewashed these. I've lost count because another problem cropped up. The blue dye coloring. Wet washcloths wring out blue coloring and stained my shower. Then I realized the dryer (new) drum has been stained by the towels too. Got the shower clean but have no idea on what to do with my brand new dryer. UPDATE: I bought these in October and with numerous washings, the blue fluff is still a problem. I have to sweep floor after use, the stuff lands every where, and pick fluff from my body and hair. I've written the seller and not going to use towels anymore till they tell me what to do to rid them of the fluff.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2020
Author: Michael Peer
Title: Don't waste your money!!!
Body: Do not buy!I purchased three sets of these towels because they were an "Amazon Choice" (Don't ever trust that) with a 4+ star rating. Which is ridiculous, because they started to fall apart from the first wash. Some of them faded badly in uneven blotches, the stitching on two towels failed immediately and even after half a dozen wash/dry cycles they continue to completely block the dryer screen with lint. I doubt I will ever be able to wash these with any other clothing. At best, these are going to be shop rags.  A complete waste of money.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2020
Author: Jose aguirre
Title: Would not recommend
Body: I was highly disappointed by this product. It was advertised as having little to no lint and it was one of the worst towels I ever had that produced the most lint. We washed the towels before using it and the amount of lint that ended up on the rest of the clothes were ridiculous, I had to re-wash the load of laundry. For paying the amount of money it cost these are not worth it. They are not fluffy, flat, and  produce an huge amount of lint. The only pro was the color of the towels. Trash product just saying 👍🏽
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Follow instructions and wash them in just a quick cycle and dry to fluff first and these will be even more soft, fluffy and absorbent. High quality fabric and the colors are pretty.  I have the Aqua and dark grey as well. The normal sized bath towels are still a great larger size that you’d expect.

Author: Penny Olivia
Title: Soft, fluffy, absorbent.
Body: These towels are perfection.  Just the righ size, weight and fluffiness, and for the price, totally worth it!  I've bought expensive towels before thinking they would be the best, but I dislike towels that are huge, heavy and glide over your skin and leave it damp which is what usually happens with big, puffy, expensive ones. These are the perfect size and weight  and they dry you right up without being rough and scratchy, they actually feel really soft and luxurious on the skin.  It's too bad I don't need anymore right now because I would buy a set in every color.  Speaking of color, the sky blue ones I got are a beautiful color, even prettier than pictured.

Body: These are a good basic set of towels. I was moving into a new place and wanted to have some new towels in place and these fit the bill. Will actually buy another set. I think towels are like sheets in that everyone has a favorite thing they are looking for. These may not be "perfect" towels for some people but I think they will fit the bill for most.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2021
Author: Thinkman
Title: Replaced another brand with these
Body: Update:  Took these out of the closet to use today and what seemed soft after the first wash hung like pieces of cardboard - couldn't brush the wrinkles and folds out of them!The first sets were washed 3 times and each wash yielded literally a handful of lint! These were washed once (in hot water as instructed) and there was minimal lint - and they came out soft.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2021
Author: Joan DiAntonio
Title: luxurious towels
Body: These are wonderful towels.  I washed and dried them before use and they are thick and luxurious.  The price is extremely reasonable for such nice quality towels.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2021
Author: Charles Dougherty
Title: Thick, absorbent and SOFT
Body: I like soft towels. But really, who doesn't want to be dried by clouds of gentle fibers? If you don't want softness brushing against your skin, don't get these towels. If you want to enjoy every time you have to dry off, these towels are for you. So far they've held up in the wash amazingly well without the colors bleeding or mountains of lint to clog the dryer. The softness is 10/10 and the absorbency is probably 8/10 (though potentially could be more but I'm dumb and use fabric softener a bit with my towels even though you shouldn't). Great towels though.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2021
Author: Hopeless Romantic
Title: Luxurious Towels
Body: I love these towels! I purchased another set of Turkish cotton towels that were waffle print but they aren’t as soft and luxurious-feeling as these. The seller sends specific instructions for washing beforehand, which I followed, and I am so pleased w these I recommended them to a friend. Would definitely order again!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2020
Author: J.E.
Title: Not absorbant.
Body: In my original review, I posted a picture of one of the towels losing color after a wash. After more time with the towels, I believe that color change was due to some skin care product that my wife uses and not a fault of the towel itself so I removed the posted picture.  The company's customer support was *great* though and they replaced the hand towel even though I now know it was not a defect in the towel itself.My main complaint with these towels is that they are not absorbent.  I have a hard time drying off after a shower which isn't something I've ever noticed with any other towel I've ever used.  These towels are fluffy, aesthetically nice, and a great price but sadly they just don't dry well.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Buyer Beware! Do not buy!!!!! They bleed!!
Body: Buyer Beware!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!If I could give these towels zero stars, I would!!!!!!I shop on Amazon on a weekly basis. I typically don’t write reviews, but this is so bad I had to. I purchased 16 sets of these towels for my Airbnb. I used a wash cloth from a set to see the quality and to my horror, the wash cloth left a blue dye on the sink surface after I rested it there for a minute. I then put the wash cloth entirely in water to check if the dye really bleeds. Please look at the video, the blue dye bled into the water and on will bleed on  surface it comes in contact with when wet. Absoultely should not be sold. What good is a towel, if it bleeds dye on when it gets wet. Do not buy these!!!!!!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2019
Author: Brent M.
Title: DO NOT BUY - HORRIBLE TOWELS
Body: When I first unpacked the towel set, I thought they weren't very soft and kind of thin.  Whatever.  They really smelled so I thought I would give them a wash.  When I pulled the towels out of the washing machine they were coated with debris - not sure how to describe but there was a lot of shedding (?) pilling (?).  So I threw them in the dryer and the filter filled up immediately with fiber debris.  20 minutes later, the same.  40 minutes later I removed from dryer and the towels were nearly thread-bare!  No thickness.  No softness.  Absolutely horrible.  DO NOT BUY.  Will try another brand . . .
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
Author: Azbard
Title: Not Bad but not what I'd hoped
Body: I'm 6'2" and couldn't find a bath sheet I liked so I tried this set, although I wish I could have bought just one towel first to evaluate. I washed them first in cold water, they shed a bunch in the drier, and became...just an ok towel set. Nothing "supersoft" here, although I don't use fabric softener in either washer or drier, so maybe that factors in to my experience. They're better than the $10 Marshall's bath towel I'd been using but not as large and not nearly as soft as I'd like so my search for the "right stuff" in a bath towel continues.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2021
Author: Yorkie Mama
Title: Excellent Quality! Super Soft!
Body: I'm very pleased with these washcloths.  The quality is outstanding.  I washed them in warm water and dried them on the "towel" cycle in my dryer.  They didn't "shred" or lose much lint at all; nor did they shrink in size.  They're incredibly soft as well.  I use them to wash the makeup off of my face.  The soap absorbs into the towels and rinses nicely.  I may look for their bath and hand towels to match! Absolutely recommend!
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
Author: Loretta Lewis
Title: thick and fluffy
Body: I read a review from another customer and decided to take their advise and am sure glad I did. These towels arrive a bit compact and stiff. READ THE WASHING INSTRUSTIONS!! Before you use them, wash and dry them and they come alive! they come out of the dryer after the first washing and drying thick and fluffy. They have a pretty binding and are well made and thick.  Don't judge them as they arrive. Wash and dry before using and you will not be disappointed .. Love the way they feel, look and absorb!! Bought extra wash cloths and am glad i can now throw away the thin worn out ones I WAS using...Great product!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2021

Title: Amazing white plush towels
Body: Amazing!!! Just re ordered more. I go thru white towels like no body business. I’m obsessed with white towels after they start to get flat and not as bright looking I cut them up and use them as cleaning towels and buy new. These towels will last longer and brighter I can already tell

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2021
Author: Heather W.
Title: Cheapskate towel snob approved
Body: All the towels in this collection, from the washcloths, hand towels, bath towels, and bath sheets are amazing.  I don’t normally write reviews but felt this one was necessary.  I am extremely picky about towels, they need to be fluffy, but not too fluffy that they they aren’t absorbent.  I can’t stand a towel that looks great but repels water and leaves me just as wet as though I never dried at all.  These are the PERFECT combination of fluffy and absorbent, wicked the water right up but we’re soft like a commercial.  Highly recommended for a towel snob who is also a bit of a cheapskate.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Sky Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2020
Author: PScher
Title: You Need to Wash These More Than Once!
Body: Initial Impressions:These towels shed like crazy (see attach photos).  I had to wash them three times and use a clothes brush on them to get most of the lint out. I also found a few lose threads that I cut.  They feel soft.  They advertise American but they are made in Turkey.  This company needs better quality control.  Buying new towels for 2021.  My next order will be Avanti.  Bought some about a year back.  They only took one washing and I don't remeber that kind of shedding.  They are still soft.  They claim to be made in North America.  I also like Belks Billtmore brand.  Never had this kind of initial problem with that brand either.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2020
Author: Kimberly
Title: Lint and color bleeding
Body: I ignored other reviews that complained about lint, thinking that happens with all soft and new towels. These are remarkable in the amount of lint they produce. After a few washes, the hand towels still left enough lint on my hands I had to rinse them again. So I spent a day washing and drying the whole group of red towels I purchased, they ran through five times. Amazingly, they are still producing lint! It doesn’t coat my hands anymore, but it falls all over the floor when the towels are used and gets on anything that goes in the wash with them. I wasn’t going to give them a negative review on the lint alone, but they have also been bleeding color on anything white they rub against while wet. Since I bought the deep red towels, I now have many pink things. I’m quite frustrated and would not recommend these towels. They are soft and a nice thickness, and the red is a great color, but not worth the lint and color bleeding!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020
Author: BluesHarp
Title: They are ok GOOD towels but look a bit cheap?
Body: You get what you pay for.. but I’d say they are worth the money. Our 14 year old son took them and loves them. They were not comparable to the quality and elegance of the $600 set we hand picked out at bed bath and beyond. The design of the hemming design decorative lines looks a little... gaudy or dorky to me. Lastly the loops are longer than what me and wife prefer and maybe that’s what makes them absorbent?? Don’t know about longevity but they sure loaded up the dryers lent filter BAD the first 3-4 times they got washed! 🤨
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2021
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Great towels, great buy
Body: These are nice quality, affordable towels. They are a decent size, though I love the huge towels, these fit just fine. I read a lot of reviews concerned about the amount of lint they leave and while they do leave some (they are brand new after all) it wasn't half as bad as I read about. I would follow the care instructions exactly. I image that helped cut down on the lint. They are very soft and quite absorbent. Colorfast, but leaves a lot of blue lint in the dryer lint trap, so maybe wash with like colored towels only. I purchased a blue set and a "charcoal" set. The gray was a lot lighter than pictured, which is a bit disappointing. I have washed the blue and gray towels together, now that they are not so brand new, and didn't have any issues with colorfastness.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2021

Title: Wrinkles up after a few washings
Body: I liked the towels at first but after each wash, they wrinkle more and more.  This is about 20 washes. I don’t recommend.

Author: Janice D. Payne
Title: I HATE THESE Wash clothes.
Body: I got these Premium clothes thinking they would be like the others I ordered from Amazon, THEY ARE NOT..  These are so thick it's like they took a premium bath towel and cut it up to make face clothes. they hold a LOT of water and are to thick I know that may sound strange but they are horrible Much more like a placemat for a dining table than a nice face cloth. Maybe its the small size of the cloth perhaps if it were 14 X 14 it would seem much better.  I'm going to donate them and try again.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2021
Author: B. Drake
Title: High quality towels
Body: We bought these hand towels based on users' recommendations, and we have not been disappointed. The pile is made of slightly longer loops than the pile on regular (nonTurkish) towels, and that makes for a fluffier product. Wash them first, and they will fluff right up. I anticipate getting lots of wear out of these towels. The three stripes are on one end of the towel only, in case you were interested. ... Am thinking about replacing our regular bath towels down the line with their equivalent from this seller.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Title: 4 months later and they are still as soft and thick as day 1 - very good quality
Body: I bought these 4 months ago and they have been through many wash and dryer cycles - they are still as plush as when I bought them and have held their color. I got the the turquoise blue color. The quality is really good - and the price is very reasonable, I paid $10 for one hand towel like this in a store and it lost its softness and faded, $25 for 6 is a steal. I plan on ordering more in several colors.

Title: I seriously, get compliments on how awesome these towels are for my "everyday" towels.....
Body: This is my second set of these towels, and I cannot say enough how much I LOVE THESE TOWELS.Seriously, I get compliments from guests at the quality of my "every day" towels... So much so, I'm thinking of getting some additional sets as "Oh, you like them? Here's a set as a gift!!" to keep around....They're a perfect size (big enough to wrap around my... not small body) but, still small enough to actually be foldable to fit in my linen storage area. They wash well, and hold up well to normal washing/drying without beginning to look worn/frayed... I'd give 6 stars if I could!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2019
Author: Airbnb Owner
Title: Good Quality for the Money
Body: I'm a partner in a vacation rental home listed on Airbnb.  We ordered 16 sets of these towels to provide to our guests, for their use at the property.  One thing I quickly noticed was the towels didn't appear anywhere near the quality of the pictures.  After the initial wash, the towels fluffed up and looked more like the pictures.  You must wash these towels before the first use.  They put off a tremendous about of lint in the first wash/dry.  Be sure to check the lint trap in your dryer midway through the drying cycle.  After that initial wash/dry, the towel produce very little lint.  The other thing we noticed about the towels is there are definitely 2 different towel sets you can receive.  We noticed the sets had 2 different tags and a slightly different shade of white.  Each set was consistent (with the same tag), but if you are ordering multiple sets (in white),  you need to be aware this is a possibility.  This wasn't an issue for us because of the use.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White
