I didn't wash them or use them, but they seem like they will fluff up and be really absorbent.The only reason I am going to return them is because the color isn't exactly what I wanted. On my phone they looked a little more mustard and a little less canary yellow. They're really pretty, they just don't match.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2021
Author: Catherine
Title: Disappointing Quality - Not the Same Towel as Past Orders.
Body: I've ordered this towel set in white multiple times. I use them in my short-term rental property. I wanted to switch to gray because it's difficult to keep the white bright after a year or so of use. I expected the same towel as the white towels only in gray. They are not.  The white towels are soft and have a tight nap (small loop) making them resistant to snagging. The Rockridge Gray towels have a loose nap and feel thinner. I'm concerned that they will have a comparatively short useful life as they will be more prone to snags. Although they are new, they look rumpled and shabby right out of the dryer.Color is another issue. I previously ordered hand towels only in "Gray". The weave and color were as expected.  This set is supposedly the same towels, but they were only available in "Rockridge Gray" and "Dark Gray," but not "Gray." The photo appears to show a tight nap, but again, it is a loose, larger-loop nap.I'll keep them, but I feel that I was deceived. I am disappointed, feel ripped off, and will be looking for a new supplier.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
Author: Roman
Title: Don’t Buy These
Body: I rarely write reviews unless a product is truly outstanding or is very disappointing. In this case, these towels are very disappointing considering the description and high number of good reviews. I ordered these “luxury” towels as part of my bathroom upgrade. The towels are soft and absorbent but fail in many other aspects. The color isn’t quite dark enough the be called navy. The don’t look or feel like nice towels should. The quality isn’t great — there are lots of loose threads. But be far the worst thing, is they shed unlike any other new towel I’ve ever had. They’ve been washed and dried 4 times and are still shedding. I’ve shaken them out several times too. There is lint everywhere, every day. I’m extremely disappointed and will never buy this brand again. I really should have spent more money for better towels.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
Author: Ken Fried
Title: Good towels - just good
Body: I am not sure how these towels get 5 and 4 star reviews. I guess it depends what towels you have used in your life. When these are advertised as SPA Quality, I am not sure what or what kind of spa they are comparing these too. I have gel towels that were night and day softer and plusher than than these at hotels and spas in various countries. These are not comparable to LUXURY towels like some reviews have stated, not even close to luxury towels. I am not saying these are bad towels, these are good towels for the money and if you are looking for better than average “commercial” grade towels then you will like these. The only reason I gave it 3 stars because they were advertised like luxury spa towels, which they are not.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2021
Author: George
Title: Distribute lint all over your skin and bathroom even after three washings!
Body: These towels are shedding a lot of Lent even after three washings! Even though they are thick they are not very absorbent. When I dry myself there is lint all left all over my skin when I wipe down the shower there’s lint all over the shower it’s pretty bad. I am hoping a few more washings will take care of this but I have never had this problem with towels before. Also I don’t like the fact that they called them American Women when they are made in turkey.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2021
Author: Lesa
Title: Great towels! Wonderful company!
Body: The first time I order these, I ordered just the one set to see how they were going to be.  Honestly have to say they are by far the softness towels we've ever used.  In fact, we liked them so much I bought four more sets in two different colors.  I purchased the Sand Taupe and the Chocolate Brown.When I first received the towels I washed them on gentle cycle/cold water and dried them on the Delicate cycle.  I did not have a problem with the first three sets, but one of the new sets (Sand Taupe) the color washed completely out in spots of the entire set.  I wasn't sure what to do, but contacted the company.  I sent photos and requested new towels.  They sent a new set out right away and  I did not have to returning the old towels.  Their service was prompt, and courteous.  Would definitely do business with this company again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2021
Author: Seda L.
Title: Sheds, But Doesn't After Multiple Uses
Body: My old towels have taken enough beatings, so I figured it was finally time to get some new ones. Like an imbecile I ran out to my local Walmart and bought the cheapest towles I could find because I thought “A towel is a towel right?”. WRONG. Those cheapo towels feel scratchy and are very bad at drying. I then immediately bought these on Amazon because of the, generally, positive reviews. These towels are very fluffy and feel soft. At first they “shed” meaning that little pieces of the material would come off the towel and onto my skin. After a few uses, this is no longer a problem. I was prepared to give them a 3-star rating due to the shedding problem, but upgraded my review to 5-stars because they just needed to be used/broken in.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2020
Author: Michelle
Title: Great Towels...but shed
Body: I purchased the brown towels.  Love them but they shed so much.  I'm on the 8th washing and they still shed but not nearly as much as they did.  You also need to wash these towels before using. I know that is common sense, but some people do not do this.  Do not be alarmed when using them for the first time that they bleed into your sink or tub (the washcloth bled alot).  And it shed so much.  This is why I only gave 4 out of 5 starts because of the shedding.  Otherwise, these towels are nice.  The washcloths are bigger than normal size too.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2020
Author: Ra'Sheon
Title: Sheds badly
Body: I figured I'd try them regardless of the other reviews. I wash everything that comes into my house before it is ever used and of course I did the same with these and the lent was everywhere. Tried to give them another chance, we used them, lent left on my body after every use. Was due to be washed again, and same results, same amount of lent every time. So yeah, I'm pretty sure I would purchase and recommend bath amenities from Walmart over these. But I do love the shade of color.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2021

Title: Color faded after 2 washes.
Body: Very soft but grey color in all towels started fading after just 2 washes. We use gentle detergent and the two batches we bought were washed in different loads are now trash after a month of use. Either the other reviews are lies or we ended up with two bad batches of towels. Can’t comment on other colors but DO NOT BUY THE GREY TOWELS!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2021

Title: Not the best, by far

Author: Diverdi
Title: Much nicer than I expected

I washed them first and dried on my regular permanent press cycle with no bleeding or excessive lint that I noticed.  The are the softest towels that I have had in a long time and super absorbent. I am ready to order more for the house bathrooms as well as a couple of bath sheets.  We just love them!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sky Blue

Author: Jody
Title: Love them!!
Body: I bought a moon phase shower curtain.  It’s black in the background, so I wanted black towels and such to put in the bathroom, too.  All the stores I’ve been to around my house had towels that felt like potato bags.  You aren’t supposed to use fabric softener when you wash towels (keeps them from being absorbent, so I took a chance and bought these towels.  These are so nice and fluffy.  I’m so glad I bought them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2018
Author: seagazer101
Title: A great buy; would buy again
Body: These towels are beautiful, especially for the price.  I recently started hosting an Airbnb, and I'm shocked to say some of the guests seem to have walked off with new, expensive towels.  So I bought this set in white, hoping they would both be attractive and less desirable as something to take home.  We shall see.  On the positive side, they are sparkling white, very fluffy after the initial wash and dry to eliminate about a pound of lint, and very expensive looking.  I'm hoping not to have to post a sign like hotels do, saying the towels are $123 each if you like them so much you must take them with you.  I'm sure I will be buying more of them.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Title: Great purchase - be sure to throw them in the washer first.
Body: These towels turned out to be really nice! When I opened the package, they began shedding immediately, and I was sure this was going to be one of those purchases I regretted making. After a run through the washer and dryer, they appear to have stopped shedding, look great, and are super soft!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2021
Author: Chris
Title: Soft and a good value

Author: Sara Vopicka
Title: One Wash and They Look Like Crap
Body: These towels are soft and look very appealing in our bathroom.... however, after ONE wash the color became messed up. It looks as if we accidentally got bleach or cleaning agent on them, but we have a new washing machine and we have never used bleach in it. We washed these towels by themselves and this is how they came out looking after they were dried. Very upsetting! These towels were a wedding shower gift to us. We have another set on our registry but I’m not sure if we should even get them. They look like crap.

Author: Diane Macellaro
Title: Fluffy and soft towels.
Body: These towels and washcloths are thick and fluffy.  They needed a few washes to remove lint and the darker colors tend to fade, but they are nice and absorbent.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021
Author: JP
Title: Great value and quality
Body: Thick
Style: Size: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
Author: RM
Title: Guest towels
Body: Better than I expected per the price. Very thick and soft.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2021
Author: Cookies6299
Title: Nice towels
Body: I have been looking for a few months for nice towels that won't break the bank and will last for a few years. I decided to give this set of towels a chance, ordered 1 set of them followed the directions pulled them out of the bag, shook them out and put in washer (i have a towel setting on mine). Dried them (cleaned the lint tray out couple of times while they were drying). They came out nice and fluffy with a definite increase in volume on them. Used them for a week or 2 before deciding to take the plunge in purchasing more, we did and at first we had issues using the 10% off next purchase. Got in contact with seller and within a few days code was working. We have sent the towels through several washings and dryings and so far so good.  As you can see in attached pictures they fluff up really nice. That was after 1 washingUPDATE: I ordered the towels on July 13th (2021)and received them on July 16th or17th washed following instructions. The towels have been used 2 to 3 at the most and have already started following apart. Company has been notified and I will change the star rating once they respond . I am really disappointed they are already falling apart with very little use.NEW UPDATE: I was in contact with the seller and they took care of the issue that we were having by sending new one. So star rating has been put back to 5 star. Replacement towels were received today and will be running them through laundry right away.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2021
Author: A customer
Title: Towels like they USED to be!
Body: Wonderful, top quality towels. Super thick, soft, and absorbent, but without being overly heavy. They also have zero lint, unlike all the other towels I have bought for a number of years. These towels have the exact same feel as the luxury towels we used in a resort many years ago. They are also exactly like the towels I used in someone's home when I traveled to Turkey  thirty  years ago. I never forgot the comfort and the feel of those towels. Until now these Turkish towels could only be found on a very few specialty websites, and they cost a fortune, way out of our reach.  Now we have them, at a great price! The seller also sent an email the day we received them, with washing instructions, a warranty, etc. A nice way to do business. Please always keep them available!
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
Author: Matt
Title: Nice Towels BUT...
Body: These are nice towels.  I purchased them in Black. I was very excited to use them when they arrived.  I washed them once and used them.  The problem was all the little fuzzies that came off the towel when I dried myself off.  It was bad, they were all over the bathroom floor (and all over me - I looked like I have been tarred and feathered).  I washed the towels again, and the same thing happened.  I tried this 2 more times (a total of washing them 4 times now, and I still get black fuzzies, not nearly as many, but still get them.  I've had black towels before and didn't have this issue, and I really haven't had this issue with any towels I've ever had before.  The other issue now is they it looks like the edging is starting to fray in some areas too.  It's too bad because these are really nice, thick, and soft.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2020
Author: Zachary Gilbert
Title: Ok product
Body: So usually one you buy bigger sets it’s suppose to be a little cheaper, not in this case it’s $0.02 cheaper to buy 4 sets of 3 over buying 2 sets of 6. Yes I did out the math because thought it was weird, like not expecting to save a lot of money but usually you save like least a couple bucks when you buy a larger set in something like this. Now the product that arrived, the feel was not that great at first, will check after running through washer and dryer if the feel changes at all but their not nearly as good as the ones my step mom has which are also Turkish cotton. Value for money is to me a little unfair based on what I got and the difference in what my step mom has and what this company makes, like I know it’s a different company but their a decent difference in hers and these ones. Hers are made by a company called chaps, should have just tried finding those in store or going to a store and buying my towels, who knows maybe I wrap these up for Christmas gifts
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2021
Author: See Me Cook
Title: These are just OK
Body: Took two washings for them to get to the basic untreated fabric. These towels have a very large loop to them, so they are soft, but not as thick as I am used to. A little on the flimsy side. The color is nice, I ordered the sage green, but it's probably around a 600 GSM and prefer something more in the range of 800. I line dry everything, so my fabrics never see the dryer. I am used to stiffer towels coming off the line, these are softer, thinner, and the large loop I anticipate will snag easier than a tighter looped fabric.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2021
Author: SeattleBookLover
Title: Generally pleased - with a couple caveats
Body: This is a review for the 40” x 80” oversized towel. Generally, I am pleased with this towel. The color is lovely and it is thick and soft. However, do be aware that it is very large and heavy - larger and heavier than I would prefer a towel to be. Because of its size, it takes up a lot of space on the towel bar and in the washing machine. Also, it took three washes before it became absorbent, and still not absorbent enough for my liking. Generally pleased, as I said, but I don’t know that I would buy it again.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
Author: GIZZ
Title: Lint Balls to thin cheep garbage.
Body: These have to be the worst towels I have ever purchased! I followed the directions and washed them in cold water before my first use. I have never seen as much crap on my lint filter as I did that night. About 1 inch thick layer, needing to be cleaned out twice in one drying, not to mention all the pieces in the washing machine. After one weeks use our bathroom had a layer of burgendy lint all over. I don't know how many double takes I have done when looking down (I'm sure you know where) to make sure I wasn't bleeding, just pieces of lint. Wouldn't buy this crap ever again!!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2021
Author: R CLARK
Title: What a WASTE of time and money!
Body: I was so happy to receive these towels. Just what I wanted. I washed and foldedthem. When I went to use them after my shower I noticed that I was covered with black lint. New towels, IThough many I didn't clean them properly. So I ran them through the laundry machine on a light cycle. At the final prinse I saw an over abundance of black! So I rewashed them. The same results. I have never experienced this before.What an absolute waste of time and money!Don't allow these people to take advantage of you and your hard earned money.These towels are trash!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2021
Author: M. Smith
Title: Large and heavyweight
Body: Finally, a towel that I can really wrap up in!  It is soft and a heavyweight.  It is not the most absorbent towel I own, but it is mostly for lounging around after a long shower.  Great for drip-drying while binge watching TV or reading a book!  I got the bright yellow so no one else in the family can pretend they used it be accident.  It is the color of Big Bird.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2020
Author: Ilsa Lund
Title: Nice towels, great value
Body: These towels are in the middle in terms of weight, so are easier and faster to dry.  They are light and fluffy but still absorbent. They don’t have the luxury fell of the larger, heavier towels. But the trade-off is good. We like these light, fluffy towels. Note: We did take the step of washing them with baking soda and vinegar before use.We have washed them a few times and use a small amount if detergent And vinegar in the rinse.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2021
Author: reader rat
Title: Get ready for lots of pilling and shedding!
Body: I bought these towels because most of our old ones were looking ragged and stained. I bought the sage green and the colonial blue (which is really a deep teal color…lovely). Both sets are soft and fluffy.  The sage green towels were fine after a couple of washings, but the colonial blue are still shedding horribly after 6 washings and dryings. Right now I am washing with vinegar in hopes that this helps.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2021
Author: AmazonShopper2006
Title: They shrink alot...
Body: After washing they shrunk to 39 x 74.5.This was a problem for a project I was working on.Making seat covers for my golf cart.I expected a bit of shrinkage but not this much.They did fade a little but with grey this was not a big deal.They are very thick, which is great. We will see how they hold up in the sun.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2021
Author: lsr
Title: So much lint!
Body: I bought three sets of these towels in three different colors.  I'm not sure why but only the yellow ones are producing insane amounts of lint.  I've washed and dried them three times.  The last time I washed them, I had to vacuum clumps of lint out of the washer and roll lint off of all the towels that were washed and dried with the yellow towels.  The blue and peach sets I bought are just fine and have produced almost no lint.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2021
Author: RyanD
Title: Very nice towels AT FIRST, but not very durable
Body: Like the suspicious number of 5-star reviews say, these are very absorbent and soft.However, they don't seem to be very long-lasting. After about five washes, they started to pill up some. After eight washes, there are long, loose threads hanging all over them, and the edges are starting to shrink.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2020
Author: D. Johnson
Title: Not Absorbent
Body: It's funny: in reading the reviews, half of us think these towels are super absorbent and half find them to be not absorbent at all.  I'm unhappy to say that I'm in the latter group.  As someone said, it's almost as if the towels have been treated with a water repellent.  I washed twice before using & have followed all other care directions.  Disappointed! Oh well, I'm still on the hunt for a soft, yet absorbent towel.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sky Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2021
Author: Kevin
Title: Doesn't absorb water
Body: Unbelievably, these towels are made from material that do not absorb water. Says it is cotton, but acts more like polyester. It spreads water around your body. Even after multiple washes, same issue occurs. Also I have 4 different colors and they all have the same issue, so the problem is not the dye.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2021
Author: Sage
Title: Awesome towels!
Body: Was looking to replace my very old towels with new ones and Soooo glad I found these after much research.As soon as we got them we washed them in warm water as suggested and dried on normal.  They will leave a huge amount of lint in your lint trap so be sure and empty it before and after.  I washed them twice this way before using and the towel are now soft and thick with good weight.So glad I found these, perfect!!!!
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
Author: Debra R. Kuwamoto
Title: Towels Shed Even After Washing
Body: These are not as thick and plush as I had hoped.  I washed them before the first use and they shed like crazy.  Even after using them a few days and a second wash, they still shed.  Not happy with with this purchase.  I guess the saying "You get what you pay for" holds true in this case.  At about $6 per item in the package, they are fairly cheap by today's standards.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2021
Author: dawn webb
Title: Wash them b4 judgment
Body: When you first get them they don't feel super thick (but not thin)  after you wash them wow they fluff up and become super thick. These are the best towels I've bought and you can't beat the price. They are over $60 quality. They are messy in the washer the first wash
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020
Author: Marguerit E. Ferra
Title: I had to wash three times before I could use
Body: I don't mind washing once or even twice before using...but three times?  The towel set was nice, good price, but I had to wash the towels three times separately in cold water before they stopped bleeding the blue dye.  Nice blue color--however, I am very unhappy that the color stained the white inside of my dryer.  I cannot recommend these towels.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Sky Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2020
Author: Star
Title: Discolouring
Body: I bought 2 bathing towel sizes. They are truly very nice; long, wide, thick. BUT they discolour from the start. My black towels became 3/4 brown, looking very worn within 2 weeks. At first I thought it was my (natural based) tanning lotion but I used the other side without using lotion and this side discoloured as well.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2021
Author: J
Title: Lint eveywhere
Body: Washed three times on gentle cycle and still lint tons of it! On my body after showering, in the dryer and after that on the floor. Plus it made me sneeze as it was stuck on my eye brows, beard and nose as well as face. Horribly made. Soft alright but does not serve the main purpose of toweling dry, wouldn’t recommend. J
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2021
Author: Lynn
Title: Buyer beware . sheds like crazy .
Body: ordered  black. they shed like crazy. has taken me a month to get them to stop shedding on my skin and the bathroom floor. have washed and dries multiple times too. once they are used takes for ever to dry . stay damp all day. disappointed .
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
Author: Vmcguire
Title: First & last time purchasing towels online
Body: This white towel is very large but it isn’t white when removing from plastic- it is a dingy red color. This is the only towel that I opened. I both big towel wraps and other towel sets & wash cloths. The other towel wraps and sets were for a gift for a college student. I am returning all towels to Amazon. I will not attempt to purchase towels online anymore. I will just have to make my purchases in person.1 star rating because I had to give a star. I don’t like giving negative reviews. Hopefully everyone else will have good experiences with these towels.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2021
Author: Deannie Foster
Title: Meh. You get what you pay for.
Body: Not impressed. They are kind of soft but not very absorbent, thick or all the hype I see in the reviews here. They definitely won’t be the towels I will be providing my guests.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2021
Author: Michelle Feist
Title: Soft, but a non-absorbent shedder
Body: I washed them before use and expected all the lint from that washing so wasn't bothered by the full tray or even the frays of fabric left in the washing machine. These are soft, but leave the floor covered in tiny lint balls after every use and are barely absorbent. I really wanted to love them because they're the perfect color, but no matter how many times I shake them out, they continue to shed.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2021
Author: Nikki
Title: Didn’t Receive Everything
Body: I ordered the six piece set, but didn’t receive everything. I got two bath towels, one wash rag, and one hand towel. Count the items in your order when you get it, if you order.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2021
Author: Lois Folla
Title: They did not wash well at all. I returned them sadly.
Body: Looked nice until we washed them for the first time. Horrible sadly. With all the great reviews I trusted them. But our experience was not good. Returned the all.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2021
Author: Lyn
Title: Wonderful large towels.
Body: This is the second set of these towels that I have purchased. We now have 4 of these very large and wonderful towels. What I appreciate most is how large they are, how soft & absorbent and they wash up beautifully. My husband is thrilled with them because the size is great for his 6'2" frame. Oh, and they are very thick and heavy. These towels are a great purchase.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2021
Author: Rick Rogina
Title: DO NOT BUY!
Body: DO NOT BUY!!!!!After washing them 6 consecutive times to get them to stop shedding they do not absorb water off your body worth a crap. I will covert to shop towels n cut them up to use.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2021
Author: BAMinCalifornia
Title: Don't waste your money buying this, it sheds constantly.
Body: These towels shed so badly they are not usable. I've washed them numerous times and it still happens. Sadly I missed the cut off time to return them so now I'm stuck with them. Don't waste your money.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2020
Author: Anna Vermeulen
Title: Mixed review
Body: These towels are soft, absorbent, as ND beautiful. I ordered them in both turquoise and dark gray. The turquoise towels are wonderful but the gray ones faded in spots on the first wash. I followed manufacturer instructions exactly but the results from the gray were awful. I've washed and dried the turquoise towels multiple times and they are still soft and beautiful.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2021
Author: William Proctor
Title: Be aware
Body: Though these towels were highly recommended, they are a disappointment. We washed them in vinegar before using them to set the color and soften them. The fluff from the towels completely covered in a thick layer the lint catcher in our dryer. They are continuing to leave lint all over the countertop in our bathroom, along with lint all over our bodies after we dry ourselves off. I would not purchase them again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
Author: S Thomas
Title: Low Quality
Body: The towels were not as thick as advertised and the loop piling was very loose.Followed the washing and drying instructions and had reddish fade stains on 1 hand towel and 2 washcloths.For the price, it was what I expected, but was hoping for better.If you want inexpensive everyday towels, then they're ok.Definitely not Turkish Luxury quality.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2020
Author: Diana
Title: This is a factory second and since when doesn't 100% cotton absorb water?
Body: The towels and hand towels are soft and a nice weight.  However, the trim is only on one side of the towel.  This used to be called a factory second..an error.  So if you hang up your tails and you like the decorative trim to show, it's only on one side.  Also, I have no idea what these 100% cotton towels have been treated with, but after numerous attempts to wash it out, they're basically water-retardant.  Not a good feeling when trying to dry off after a shower.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2021
Author: stephen
Title: Black towels are a no no
Body: Never again. The towels themselves were ok as far as softness etc but the black!! Awful!!! I washed them every way possible a 100 times and still had black lint all over me when drying off. Couldn’t handle it. Will resort to using them for washing cars and chores around the house :(
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2021
Author: amanda sedberry
Title: Dissatisfied
Body: After just 1 wash and 1 usage the towels turned colors….almost like it was bleached but I promise it was never near bleach!!  Not sure why this happened, but it was more then just one towel it was the set that was purchased.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
Author: Ghee
Title: Ugh....Still Wet the Next Day
Body: These towels are attractive and inexpensive.  They are absorbant.  But they don't dry out between showers in 24 hours like every other towel I've ever used.  It's bizarre. It's unsanitary and unpleasant so I don't recommend them.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2020
Author: Rose
Title: Worth the price
Body: Huge towel. Great after a luxurious bath or for a larger person. Not as plush or thick as I would would have thought. I washed it on the regular cycle, I had to clean the lint from the washer tub. It  took 2 dryer cycles to dry and left a lot of lint there too. Maybe the original wash and dry removed all the excess lint and dye? It is worth the price I paid.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2021
Author: Green Eyes
Title: Decent towels, but they shed terribly.
Body: I have washed them several times, and still shed, leaving towels balls on your body and on the floor.  I would not recommend.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2020
Author: Nestor
Title: At best; lack of quality control ?
Body: Good afternoon. Received all items ordered. Colors and material quality as expected. However, the large Yellow Turkish towel has too many stains. Maybe these stains should have been noted when folding the towel; when placing the towel in plastic bag; stains where evident when I opened the box upon receiving it. This is only notifying you; not a judgement on possible mistake. Thank you.Tried seller’s feedback; no response.  Some photos I uploaded show what appears to be different color; that is caused by sunlight used to highlight the stains
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2021
Author: Godiva Mahoney
Title: Better Than Advertised!
Body: There are certain items that I have never had great experiences shopping for on-line. Bath towels are one of those items. I need to be able to see and feel the quality of the fabric used for the towels, not to mention seeing the true colors.American Soft Linen has taken the guesswork out of purchasing towels over the internet! I am over the moon with the quality of the towels I bought. They are  absorbent, fluffy and soft, and the color is true to the ad!! I won't buy any other brand on-line from here on out. Thanks so much for this quality product.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sky Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2021
Author: HHC
Title: Washed twice before using. absorbancy, still not good
Body: After one pre-wash the towel was not very absorbant, almost water resistant.  Even after the second washing (warm water) it had not improved.  Nice feel when dry. But does not absorb water.  Very thick and heavy. to use
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Very soft.
Body: Very soft towels......however, you feel "evenly wet" after using them. There is little to no absorbency😔
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2020
Author: MercyS
Title: Quality leaves  a lot to be desired
Body: This is the first time I bought towels through Amazon and based on  reviews, and I'm really disappointed.I received the towels 3 days ago, and so far I have washed them 3 times by themselves and the lint just keeps on shedding I have never seen towels shed so much, and now the outline of one of the towels is beginning to fall apart.I would recommend for people looking to by good bath towels for every use to go to Costco or BJ's. the brand name CHARISMA is great and cost effective.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: They fall apart and bleed dye
Body: Worst towels I ever owned. First wash left a cup of shed fibers in the washer drum. Then completely filled the dryer lint filter. continue to shed even when drying yourself. Can't even imagine how these are manufactured. Oh! and did I mention the color bleeds even after use. I'd give zero stars, if I could. Do not buy these.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2021
Author: Bart
Title: Not as lux as people say
Body: Pro:- SoftCon:- Very thin (thinner than hotel towels). I thought these would be thick and plush but they’re not even as thick as hoodie material- They don’t look that great; brand new and they look worn outOverall not great value for money. I travel 2-3 times per week so experience a lot of different towels; these are on the lower-end of the spectrum
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2020
Author: Samuel Rothchild
Title: Good at first but take care of them, they won't last long.
Body: These are excellent towels so long as you wash them in cold water and don't wash them too often.  I run a B&B and they will only last a year or so.  They eventually warp and fray and lose color.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2021
Author: yolanda
Title: Very soft
Body: Changing my review. At 1st I gave it 1 star and that was due to substantial amt of shredding after wash. I now give it 3 stars due to the fact the towels are very soft. After 3 washes the shredding stop.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2021
Author: talented
Title: Crap towels.
Body: Honestly I was so excited to get new towels. At this point days after recieving them, I still cannot use them unless I want to be covered with fuzz. I have legitimately washed and dried them over 20 times which apparently isnt working as they still have outrageous amounts of fuzz coming off them. Because of all the washing its had to go through they are now rough. Way to much money to spend for towels you can not even use.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
Author: Candace
Title: Fuzz everywhere.
Body: Not sure why this has so many good reviews. I washed them 4 times and the dryer would still have a bunch of lint. When drying off after a shower, the towels would leave fuzz everywhere.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2020
Author: Leesaw
Title: Lacking consistency...
Body: I feel like a crazy person writing this ... but I ordered two sets of these and they do not match! They’re both a bright white color. However, one set has a much longer pill than the other and they do not match. I’m so annoyed.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2021
Author: sallie Mueller
Title: I liked the softness of these towels

Towels looked good (though flimsier than I had expected)  I had not purchased anything from this company before, and am unlikely to again. I am accustomed to better quality towels, and made the error of thinking that this was a way to get quality for less money.  If you want good quality, you need to pay for it. I should have known better.

Author: LordPhantomhive17
Title: It is great towels for those price.
Body: I am not sure about if it is softy as plushness or softy as rabbit or whatever. One thing I can say it is soft but not fancy softness but regular softness. It is very thick and large hand towel where most hand towel are usually small. Absorbency is just unbelievable good, easily wet as it is dry out as you hang it on the rack. I like it. Oh right...I recommend wash them first and I should know better haha but still when you first use them and pour water onto it and squeezing them out and you literally can see color dyes drained out along with water that squeezed out. This is normal I think...it is basically new towels and different from towels that has been sitting on shelves at the stores. Anyways wash them before use. I rather like the feeling of the towel when scrub against my skin unlike where most well feel bit rough and brittle and that is, my friend, a cheap towels whereabout this does not have those feelings.  I think I shall buy more later.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2021
Author: Amit
Title: Do not buy!
Body: Why does one buy a towel-- to pat yourself dry after a shower. This product fails miserably at that. It has very little absorbency even after all the instructions are followed.Pros:Very softLooks expensiveGood for the priceCons:Has very little absorbencyWhen put in the washer/dryer it loses a lot of lint. I have had to keep the dryer on extra time to get this to dry.Loses color in the first washer runRecommendation: Save yourself and look at other towels. This one is absolute garbage.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2020
Author: Lisa Roman
Title: Awful
Body: These towels looked nice but it says to wash them before using.  It took no less than 3 washes for them to stop bleeding color and at that point there were hanging threads and unraveled seams.  And there were piles of lint all over my washing machine.  I mean handful after handful that I had to scrape out of my washer and then after drying my lint screen in the drier was covered half an inch deep.  Very low quality. And they look terrible after the wash.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2020

Title: Not absorbent at all
Body: This towel was not absorbent at all! It basically wiped moisture around and left a damp sheen on my skin. Even after three was Kong’s with no softener at all it was terrible. Yes, it is very soft and a great size, but what good is a towel that leaves you wet???

Body: These are soft, fluffy, and just the right amount of thickness. They are also just the right size for a bathroom washcloth. I'm sure all of these are subjective, but these turned out perfect for me.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
Author: jo
Title: Great Wash Cloth
Body: Really great wash cloth. 13x13 Very soft washes well, no shrinkage or tattered edges. Beautiful colors!
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2021
Author: Hernan Arias
Title: Material is not so nice
Body: I purchased these for my downstairs bathroom. They're not that soft and I dont really like how the material looks. However, I purchased them especially to match my decor and the color is as described.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2021
Author: Tori A.
Title: Nice but sheds
Body: Recommend washing machine and drying and then repeat another wash and dry cycle before using because sheds and smell like sweat shop. Smell went away after first wash. Shedding stopped after second.Edit: I’m on my fourth laundry and the towels still shedding. Reduced stars.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in Italy on March 30, 2021
Author: Anita👩🏼
Title: Morbidi da non assorbire
Body: Sapete il detto “la bella che non balla”, ecco sono proprio i asciugamani in causa.Se volete asciugamani morbidissimi, ma che NON ASSORBONO comprateli, sono davvero MORBIDISSIMI!Sono meglio quelli che ho preso a 20€ di questi pagati 49€...delusa proprio, talmente mi ha ingannato la loro morbidezza che li ho lavati subito quindi non posso neanche più fare il reso.Qualità-prezzo sconsiglio!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in Mexico on April 30, 2021
Author: dalia
Title: Muy bonitas y de buen tamaño
Body: Excelente tamaño, muy suaves y bonito elColor que elegí , ya las lavé por primera vez y súper bien, no se despinto.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in Canada on July 18, 2021
Author: jennifer costello
Title: Cozy blanket sized towel
Body: This towel is literally as big as one of my favorite throws. It's super absorbent and perfect for when you spend an hour after your shower wrapped in a towel looking at your phone because you can't find the will to find an outfit just yet.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in Canada on March 2, 2021
Author: Crystal
Title: Big, comfy, and perfect for me
Body: Huge and heavy, comfy, but not great for absorbing moisture. I love this towel. I like to wrap up and slow dry so this works great.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in Canada on May 2, 2021
Author: Russ
Title: Great quality!
Body: Very soft and great quality.  Worth the money.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in Canada on January 13, 2021
Author: john
Title: very soft
Body: great towel very soft color is great
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in Canada on July 6, 2021
Author: BL
Title: Not very absorbent
Body: It’s big, and soft, and doesn’t absorb water very well.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2021
Author: Sherry S. Eastman
Title: Horrible towels
Body: I pre-washed/dried one of the sets as instructed, washing in warm water, by themselves, as seller sent specific instructions to do so.  These towels come out of the dryer with balls all over them.  I've tried picking all the excess off of each piece and a lot still remains.  I then tried a hairbrush to try to gather it all,  and then sticky tape,  and they are still a mess.  Numerous areas, too, with loose threads throughout them.  I have towels that are 5 years old that look better!  Peach color is great, which is why I bought them.  I redid my bathroom and the color is perfect.  Disappointed because they were all I could find in the right color shade.  So, I guess I will keep the sets of unwashed towels displayed on the towel racks for "show" only and will use another set for "daily use".  Told hubby, "sorry, you can't use the new towels, they're just to look pretty".  Thank goodness I only washed one set of the three so the unwashed ones still look good.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2021
Author: Jim Bob Jones
Title: So Far, So Good
Body: These towels are soft and absorbent.  However, we have used them only a few weeks and are unable to determine just how long they will retain these characteristics. Longevity is of critical importance to us. If they only last a year or two it is doubtful we will continue to purchase them.  They require several washings to eliminate lint and dye.  You may be shocked when you look at your dryer filter even after two consecutive wash and dry cycles.  We like the variety of colors that make it easy complement our decor.  At this point our gold standard for longevity is Biltmore. We continue to use several sets after 5 years or more and they remain soft and absorbent.  I will confess we originally paid more than $40 per set, perhaps $65-$70.  Overall, very good towels at a reasonable price whose longevity is yet to be determined.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
Author: Mr. Matthew Ryan Brooks
Title: Lint City
Body: After at least 12 washes, all of the bath towels that I purchased (five total) are still producing copious amounts of lint. I cannot use the towels to dry myself after a shower without covering myself in it. I'm used to seeing lint from a quality product after one or two washes, but to see it after twelve is unreasonable. As soon as I begin to dry off, I'm forced to throw the towel into the bin and use the next one, until its lint production becomes equally intolerable. Thus, I get only a single, partial use out of each towel before needing to wash it again. Obviously, there is some kind of quality deficiency behind this. My return window is closed, so I'm stuck with these towels that will just have to be replaced within the year. Not a good purchase.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
Author: Marilyn
Title: Positive reviews are true!
Body: These towels appear to be little or nothing until they are washed and then they are wonderful.  I would like a set in every color (if that was practical), but I will order again. So sorry to hear others have struggled with lint (normal with towels), with color fading (mine are orange and do not seem to have any problems so far), absorbency (don't use fabric softener!).  Plus, the price is right - so if there was a problem I wouldn't hesitate to use them with grandkids, in craft projects, or general clean-up in order to buy a new set.  Now I wait to see when that day comes.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2021
Author: Alaska Girl
Title: Flaws after washing
Body: I haven’t used these towels yet because they are for the bathroom that is being remodeled; however, I did wash them. After washing, the edges of 2 towels were very stringy with threads. I cut the strings off, but I’m wondering how many washings before the towel edges look like rags. Also, after washing, (in my new machine that doesn’t have an agitator) one of the bath towels had a big flaw where loops were pulled out by an inch, so I tied the loops together in a knot and cut off the excess. Will it last before there is a hole? I don’t know. Other than these manufacturing flaws, the towels are soft and fluffy.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2021
Author: kathy
Title: I wish I could give this 10 Stars
Body: I got this towel along with body soap and a man-scrubber for my son for his 17th birthday. The towel is long enough to cover him to the ankles and wraps around him one and a half times. He's 6'2 and 225 lbs. When he came out of his first shower with his gifts, he said "I have never felt so clean and pampered in my life". When I ask him what he would say in a review he said "just tell them that this is what a man wants at the end of every hard day of work". Would I buy this again..I intend to get this for all the brothers and nephews as Christmas gifts this year.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
Author: Rebekah Weaver
Title: Amazing towel after it stops shedding lint
Body: As others have mentioned this towel looks less than impressive when you first get it, but over time they fluff up and are super soft as well as absorbant, definitely the best towel I've had in a long time.However, these things shed lint forever, maybe it's because we got the bath sheet and it's so big but it took so many washes and uses before the lint was gone, still worth it though.Speaking of bath sheet, we ordered it not really paying attention to the size kinda just thinking it was a larger towel, wrong. This thing is massive, really overkill unless you are a large person so if you are considering it make sure to look at the measurements.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2021
Author: A Regular Shopper
Title: The colors of the bath and hand towels are different.
Body: The four bath towels came a few days before the hand towels. Loved the bath towels! The hand towels came and I washed them per the instructions before hanging them. Unfortunately, the colors are not the same. Both say Sand Taupe. But the hand towels have a slightly reddish tint by comparison. I'll return the hand towels and try once more, and if they don't match again I'll send them all back. I will also update this review.UPDATE: The second set of hand towels is also a different shade than the bath towels. Everything is going back.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
Author: Lydia Kimble-Wright
Title: Bath Towels Faded
Body: I am not pleased with this purchase at all! I’ve had these towels less than a month, and the bath towels have already faded. I have included a photo. The item on top is the bath towel, and the bottom is the hand towel. When I received the set of six, each was the color of the hand towel. They are washed about once a week, and I did not expect them to fade so quickly. Usually, I would box them and return them for a refund, but I don’t feel well enough to bother with it. I will definitely not purchase the brand again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2021
Author: Tony R.
Title: Dyed/Color Bleed After the First Wash
Body: We bought 2 sets (8 towels). While the towels felt very soft, the instructions state to wash before use.  So we washed them (no bleach) and after removing from them from the washer they were color stained/bleed from the dark gray to orange/pink spotty areas. However, only 4 of the 8 towels that were all washed together did it which makes me think there is some other chemical or something potentially on the towels. After seeing other reviews about color bleeding/discoloration after a few washes, we opted to return all 8 rather than face the discoloration of the other 4 later.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
Author: Fubar22
Title: DO NOT BUY - unless you like lint everywhere
Body: I gave these their due time to try to make them work - after 3 months, 6 washings....they still shed lint worst than a Husky in the middle of the dessert.Absolutely the worst quality you can imagine - you get what you pay for.  I wanted to like these...I really did, but in the end I just could not stand having my shower stall covered in black lint that sheds, my sink drain full of black lint after splashing water on my face to get rid of the lint from drying off in the shower, and the constant dryer filter full of lint after every wash/dry.  DO NOT BUY.  You have been warned
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
Author: E
Title: Small, soft, handy!
Body: Honestly I kind of bought these on a whim because I wanted to have a small face towel for the shower and one to keep by my turtle tank (for accidental water spills and the like). These are top-notch! I didn't really know what to expect as these are pretty cheap, but the pictures don't lie. They're soft, they absorb a lot more than I thought, but still small enough that they don't take up much room anywhere.I saw reviews about color leakage so took care to hand-wash them myself (I don't have an in-house washer/dryer and don't want to spend $10 just to wash 4 hand-towels) and didn't notice any bleeding on the Grey set I got. Maybe it's just certain colors?
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2021
Author: equus924
Title: LOTS OF LINT
Body: I love the look of these towels. They're big and soft. However, the amount of lint coming off of them is pretty substantial. I bought these in turquoise and black. I washed the turquoise once as directed and dried them on low. The first use left fuzzies everywhere. In my washer, my dryer, on me and on my floors. I washed the black twice and then dried them. They threw just as many fuzzies as the turquoise. I'm really hoping that continued washing will lessen the amount of lint. Fingers crossed.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2021
Author: Kevin
Title: These work but be ready for a lot of dust and lint
Body: The towels have a good feel to them and they do their job well, but when you get them, be ready to empty the lint filter on the dryer and vacuum it out.  You'll want to also take the towels outside and beat them a bit to help with the delinting process.I've only been through two washings on the ones I purchased so far, but it definitely seems like they have a lot of loose fibers coming off.  I'll have to come back and update the review after a few more washings.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2021
Author: Amanda
Title: Lint. So much lint. Lint everywhere
Body: Bought these towels and I really wanted to love them. Washed before using as per the instructions, open my dryer and there's so much lint that it just falls out. Use the towels and am left COVERED in lint. Ok, no big deal I think, maybe if I dry it again the lint will go away. Nope, not at all. I dried these towels 4 times and even after that, both I and all surfaces of my bathroom were COVERED in lint. It was so bad that I looked like a werewolf. Definitely returning these.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2021
Author: Hur600
Title: Only use these towels!!! BEST TOWELS YOU'LL EVER OWN!!!!! Please: robes out of same materials!
Body: I've ordered from them 5-6 times for myself, gifts for others, etc. Their robes are super soft, but I do wish they made robes out of the same material/count, etc., they use for their towels. The bigger towels (this review, jumbo, etc.,) are wonderful, as are their more standard sized sets/towels. Follow the directions for the first wash, thereafter. First few washes, the colors can bleed (it will stop after a wash or two), but with each wash, they just get BETTER AND BETTER!!!PLEASE MAKE ROBES OUT OF THE SAME AS YOUR TOWELS!!!  I love the robes I've ordered from you, but I have multiple friends begging me to let them know when or if you will make robes from the same Turkish cotton.Gorgeous colors/color combination options! Great packing, shipping, communication, etc. LOVE THEM!!! 1 Million AMAZONIAN STARS!!!!!
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2021
Author: battleshipcapt
Title: Great Find
Body: These towels surpass any in this category available on the the market.  This is stated with 50+ yrears of housekeeping and world travel.  I did not find any lint or ‘shedding’ after washing.  It should be noted that many natural material fabrics will not look as bright after washing.  The product should  be considered defective if splotchy after washing.  The large jumbo towel is worth every penny.  Recommend these towels for all- big and small
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2021
Author: Jenny Zheng
Title: Best towels I’ve ever bought
Body: These towels are SO. GOOD. I got these after someone literally stole a pack of new towels out of our car that we forgot to take out. Well, I guess everything turned out alright even because it led to this purchase haha. Super soft. Very absorbent. Perfect after throwing them in the washer/dryer before use once you get them. These look to be good quality and so far have been an excellent choice. I foresee these being our go to towels for a while!
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2021
Author: mary j.
Title: Left lint all over me and don't dry well
Body: I was so excited to use these towels after reading so many positive reviews. I washed them before using them as directed. They still looked really dark after washing. When they were done in the dryer, the dryer lint trap was very full of black lint. The wash cloth was amazing to use, but when I used the towel, it didn't dry me well and  it left black lint all over me. I had to get rinsed off again and even then, i got black lint all over the fresh towel I got out to use. I will give them another wash and see if this improves them any.Update. I washed and dried them a second time and they aren't better. They still don't dry well and they left fuzz all over me.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
Author: Magna One
Title: They leave little fabric when drying dishes - Cat likes to chew on them
Body: I got these because they were affordable. I was pleasantly surprised with the durability of the material and they were also really soft. But I got them to dry the dishes, and they end up leaving very small pieces of cloth material. The other thing, the material resembles the softness of a blanket and our cat loves to chew on blankets. So sure enough she grabbed one of them and chewed on them and peed on one of them. I have one left, it was kind of a waste, just get a more durable less 'soft' rag that doesn't leave pieces of fabric on things.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2021
Author: Dean J Trenery
Title: Towel issues
Body: I selected a set in black as it was time for a change based on a recent remodel of a guest bathroom.Upon receipt they looked and felt very good in combination with the price point I felt they were a good value.I washed them as instructed....Unfortunately I have been quite disappointed for three reasons  The absorption capabilities of the towels is quite bad in that with the bath towel (ex) you move moisture around....but rarely feel dry. Should be pretty basic for a towel.  Additionally, if washed the rinse water is always very black. And if dried in the dryer, the lint trap is typically filled with black cloth residue.So....as the following should be towel 101  Overt lack of absorption  Color fast issue  And thread separation.Look good....but would not recommend
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2021
Author: Candice C.
Title: Really great towels
Body: I bought three sets of 8 each of these towels (three different colors). so far I have only noticed three hand towels that have some "stringing" thread hanging loose after washing. If those are the only ones in all these towels, I will be very happy. They are very absorent and the color held up well after washing. Overall, so far, I am very happy with my purchase. I may try out the warranty after I use them awhile to replace the defective ones.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2021
Author: DC
Title: Shedding, shedding, shedding! Don't fall for the reviews!
Body: I followed the instructions carefully. After the first wash and dry, dryer filter was jammed with thick lint and towels were shedding.  They weren't very soft, so thought I try another wash, again following the instructions.  Strings all over the washer & again, dryer filter packed with lint.  I can literally pull pieces of threads off of the towels with my fingers.  I'm returning the towels and wash cloths, but keeping the hand towels as we have used one pair.  So many good reviews, and I usually have good success with Amazon.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2021
Author: Ally
Title: lint everywhere
Body: I’m torn with these. I really liked how they felt and how they looked. BUT they left black lint EVERYWHERE. All over my body, all over my countertops, in my washing machine, dryer. On and on. I keep waiting for it to stop shedding after I washed them so many times, but they never did. So they ended up in the trash, which was frustrating and unfortunate. Maybe if I had gotten a different color it would have been better? Who knows
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2021
Author: Nancy
Title: Be prepared for shedding
Body: These are very soft and the black color is very saturated throughout and have not faded through many washes.  BUT, the reason for many washes was to rid them of the lint. I followed directions to wash first and Wow my washing machine was full of lint!  They are still shedding and I’ve been using a hand vac every day after our showers to clean our bathroom floor.  They are getting better and maybe this is normal? for this type of long cotton thread.  Also, I did not check the size of the towels.  I bought the sets, I’m a small person,  but feel they are on the short side to wrap around me.  My husband won’t use these as he feels they are non absorbent. I kinda agree & hope they will improve with more washes.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2021
Author: Stuart Woods fans
Title: In navy, color is not set!
Body: So disappointed in these. I loved the color for my newly remodeled bathroom, but after MANY washings the colors still bleeds and they are very linty. Have had the washcloths for a few months, washed them several times before using, as directed, and they still bleed blue dye in my bathroom sink! They have been washed so many times now they aren’t a dark blue, but they still bleed. I will have to replace them because I don’t think they are safe to use.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2021
Author: Superman
Title: Disappointed
Body: At least 6 washes and still sheds.  Noticed this morning part of the towel is unraveling at the bottom.  I’m super careful and just wash the set together with nothing else to avoid rub off or fading in cold water, gentle cycle, woolite dark wash, medium dry.  Despite this the deep black is fading.  And the lint filter is still full of shedding.  Sure they’re absorbent and soft.  But none of that matters if they’re fading and falling apart.  Don’t recommend.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2021
Author: SanH
Title: They are great!
Body: I ordered these towels a short time ago. I ordered the 6 piece set and was NOT disappointed. The are so soft and fluffy and beautiful. So, I ordered a 3 piece set to go along with them because the company sent me a 10% off coupon. However, when I placed my order, they would not accept the coupon. Since it only amounted to a couple of dollars I ordered them anyway, but I have to admit I was a little disappointed with the company that doesn't honor their promise.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2020
Author: Jackie Corley
Title: Not absorbent, lots of shedding on wet skin
Body: These towels feel great when you are dry, very soft to the touch. I have washed these towels 4 times now (with regular laundry detergent and no fabric softener) and the towels are still shedding all over my body when I use to dry off after the shower.I’m sure the shedding will stop after I wash them more but who wants to waste detergent and water on clean towels just to remove the shedding?!? They are not absorbent on wet skin, not at all. Wish I could return these. I do not recommend
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2021
Author: Joseph L.
Title: I'm a fattass
Body: This towel is great. I am an extra large human and I am unable to use regular towels. They are more or less the size of large dish cloths to me. This towel however, is large enough that I can use it as a towel. For some much smaller people this towel would likely be able to wrap around them 3 to 4 times with a little to spare. For me it's nice to have a towel that does not leave me with my balls hanging out or my ass free to the wind.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2021
Author: Jacqueline A. Wilson
Title: LINT all over my bathroom.
Body: The towels are nice to the touch after first washing.  However, a TON of lint was in my dryer screen.  They seemed to come out okay and  looked nice hanging in my bathroom but, after using them, there is a massive amount of lint all over my bathtub/shower, bathroom and my body/hands, etc.  I’m rewashing all 4 sets to see if that helps or if they’ll simply continue to shed.  Very disappointed.UPDATE:  They’re just as bad after rewashing.  I’m returning them for a full refund
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2021
Author: Tiny loves a good read
Title: Bought for out of town company
Body: The towels arrived promptly and look fine. I confess I didn’t personally use them as they were bought to have a nice set for company. My friend left yesterday and I am sure they were very nice for her. I plan to wash them today along with the bed linens. I washed them before putting them out for my guest, so I know they washed well. When I need more bath or kitchen towels, I will get back to you. Thanks for a lovely product.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2021
Author: nicelyprepared
Title: Had to shower again after using these
Body: I purchased these for my husband's bathroom.  I washed and dried them before using.  When he dried himself off he was covered with lint from the towels and had to shower again to get it off.  Since I have already washed them I guess I can't send back for refund.  I have washed these towels 5 times and my dryer lint vent is filled with lint still.  This keeps up there will be worn out just washing them. Very disappointed:-(
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2021
Author: Anna
Title: Color bleeds long term
Body: I ordered 10 towels in 5 different colors so everyone in my home had 2 of their own color.They are soft yesBut they bleed long term, I figured after multiple washes separated by color they’d be fine.Sadly that wasn’t the case and now my sons bright yellow towels are stained from his sisters teal towelsI’ve never had this issue with any other brand of towels after they’d been washed a few times.So I’m very disappointed after how much I spent on them
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2021
Author: nash
Title: Def not worth 5 stars as most ppl rate it
Body: I ordered this base on the review but not super happy with it.  I give it 3 stars for all as its soft but not super soft.  After washing the towel after arrival I washed them in cold water and soap.  I accidentally added white towel and that towel came out light blue now.  I hope the color is not going to fade in the next wash as I wash all my towels together.  Otherwise I will be returning this for sure with 1 star.  Also noticed that my hands doesn't get completely dry after use.  For now I give it 3 stars for the price I paid I guess you can't more.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Can I give a minus four strs for this crappy product?
Body: Turkish towel,  my arse. This thing is so worthless I tossed it after I laundered it to see if the dingy grey-whitetowel would look any better once cleaned...NOPE! It got even more dirty looking AND threads were peeling from the side of the towels and the washcloth was shredded...mind you this was in a front loading washing machine on delicate cycle.  DO NOT BUY THIS! It's pure crappola.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2021
Author: sewinace Kim
Title: Sheds fibers
Body: I’m really bummed.  I was excited to buy these towels for my husband‘s newly decorated bathroom. He absolutely hates them. Even though I’ve washed them three times, they still shed tiny fibers all over the place leaving him, the bathtub, and the floor full of tiny fibers. I will keep washing them and hope that eventually they disappear but these are not the highest quality towels.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
Author: Margee
Title: I sent these back
Body: No matter how many times I washed these, I still got lint on me when I used them.  Pretty icky when you put lotion on your face and it picks up black lint.  Also, I didn't find these as absorbent as the more expensive Turkish towels I bought.  Even though these towels got wet, my skin still felt cold when I used these.  I've never liked fluffy towels, so these were a mistake and I sent them back.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
Author: Theresa
Title: Best towels in a long time.
Body: Best towels I've had in a long long time.  The stay soft after lots of washing. We wash frequently so they don't smell.  They also absorb well.  They are big enough to wrap up in.  Most towels as of late seem to get ruff quickly.  Even when washing them as directed.  These towels are still going strong with the softness.  They also do shed in the dryer a bit.  Lots of lint every time.  But doesn't seem to affect them.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2021
Author: Brenda Greenwald
Title: I would never buy again
Body: Upon arrival, I washed the towels separately and per the instructions. They are very soft and absorbent. However, even after multiple weeks of washing and drying per the instructions, they still leave lint on my body after use. My bathroom gets lint everywhere. While washing, the lint sock needs to be replaced after every washing. I’ve had to stop the drying cycle midway through because the lint screen gets filled with extremely thick lint buildup.  I would NEVER even consider washing or drying them with any other items. These towels are just plain messy all around and I would never buy them again!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2021
Author: Cindy
Title: Great towels...However
Body: These are so nice but prepare for lint.  Mine have been washed 4 times each and still linty.  I accidently put in a dish towel in with them and had to throw the dish towel away. I bought two colors and have to wash them separately.  This has happened before with towels and sheets purchase locally or online.  The positive ratings are probably because they haven't washed them yet.  But they are nice.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sky Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2021
Author: Gooch
Title: Lots of fuzz
Body: I ordered 2 sets of the blue and I don’t know if the type of washing machine as anything to do with all the fuzz coming off the turquoise towels. I washed them 3 times and as I was putting lotion on I had so much lint all over my body. My washing machine was full of lint and the dryer had thick lint even after 3 washes. I could make a whole towel there was so much
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2021
Author: LavvyFoxy
Title: Looking for that perfect towel?
Body: Most towels you buy when looking for that nice soft but fluffy texture are hard to find especially when it comes to it absorbing water fast then wringing it out quickly. One thing is always missing but with these towels, there perfect. The soft fluffy texture is just right, even a baby could use this towel. It’s gentle on the face and skin. And the water absorption is on point, I’m not sitting here forever trying to get the water to soak into the towel - it soaks up the water quickly and wrings out quickly in a timely matter.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
Author: Grace Tohave
Title: Best Touch You'll Have All year 😄
Body: I bought the Lemon Yellow just for the color, to match my new decor.😂 Ya, Well,,, It didn't make it. I took them out and by the time everyone that was here was done FONDELING* My Towels,,, lol they were in the washer and in my cupboard's. SOFT 🐇 Oh My! SOFT,,,YES,,YES,, 🐣🐇 Like? And the choices of colors, The BEST.. I Think I've gone TURKISH. And not just Jason Statham Turkish😂💗
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
Author: Lady CEO
Title: Big towels for big people!
Body: Love these towels for my hubby! We have been in way too many hotel rooms when we travel and I can not tell you how many times he has said to me, "Honey, I think I grabbed a hand towel instead of a bath towel". I love these huge, comfortable, absorbent towels.  I love the grey ones so much that I purchased the brown ones too! Once you go BIG, you won't go back!!
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2021
Author: Lori A. Vizyak
Title: Good size for plus size humans, LOL
Body: I like this because I am somewhat big but I mainly got it to lounge in. After the shower to get hygiene done.  It's so comfortable wish it was a blanket?  Covers well.  I generally have to climb on my bed to find my glasses.  It stays on and doesn't part.Only con is it takes alot of room in the washer and dryer. I would buy this again...Color and thickness is great.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020
Author: TRHenderson
Title: They need deported back to Turkey!
Body: Wife received them today and all she did was do a light wash cycle on the 1st set.  when the washer quitshe went to grab them out and they slipped from her hand she told me.  What it was she showed me herhand where she had grabbed the towels.  The dye had ran enough for her hand to slip and stain. Now talk about lint, I think I could hold a yard sale for mice with all the lint we got.. see images, Those were compressed piles.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2021
Author: K Jones
Title: Perfect Colors
