Body: I bought 2 sets, a bath sheet and 2 sets of bath mats in Espresso and 2 sets and a bath sheet in Sand Taupe.  The colors are perfect in my new house, and they were in stock and came quickly.  They are very soft, wash up great and don’t shed as we towel off.  I wish they were a little heavier and more tightly woven.....I do see a few snags.  All in all they are totally functional, attractive and REALLY a great price!!  I would buy them again!!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2021
Author: N. Curry
Title: Shed more than my dog!
Body: There was a ton of lint left in the washer after I first washed them, even before going to the dryer. Every time I use the towel there is so much lint that falls off I have to use a vacuum cleaner to clean it all up! And of course a lot of lint sticks to me as I dry myself off. I was hoping after one or two washes it would go away, but it hasn't. I'm glad to see I'm not the only person that has had this problem. I should've paid more attention to the reviews!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2021
Author: Anónimo
Title: Lint City!!!
Body: Just got these today. I took a risk with these because I can't find any towels in turquoise with really high number of reviews (not ratings). The poor reviews about lint are true! We immediately washed and dried, cleaning the lint filter three times! I was warned.Also, I feel the color was off, not as deep as in the photos. They are thick and seem to hold up in the wash, I will update accordingly.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
Author: Andy H. Greenwald
Title: Soft and dries well
Body: American Soft Linen has solved the quest.  If you are looking for a soft towel that has many color options and dries well, this is that towel.  It is comfortable and is the right blend to absorb water, but dry well for the next day.  I am extremely happy.  I do wish the towel was a few inches longer to wrap around more, but it is not problematic.  well done
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sky Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2020
Author: Cindy Ward
Title: Somewhat disappointed in the Bath towel
Body: We purchased the set of 6, 2 of each Bath towel, hand towel and wash cloth.  The hand towels and wash clothes were heavy enough and large enough but the bath towels did not measure up to expectations.  I knew they were not going to be quite as long and wide as the towels they were designed to replace but I had at least hoped they would be as heavy.  I read all kinds of reviews and without being able to actual touch them hoped for the best but my husband especially was critical.  I am hoping that after a few washings they may fluff more, the towels they will replace I didn't like at all until they were washed quite a few times.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2021
Author: Maria
Title: Fuzzy Wuzzy
Body: My purchase was for the black towel set. I washed the towels prior use. I'd to pass through the towels in the dryer, twice, due to the amount of lint accumulated in the trap. After as I was drying after my shower,  I was covered in so much black lint that I'd to jump back in the shower. I washed and dried the towels again and still there was lint on my hands. I threw these towels in the garbage with my money.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2021
Author: valerie c.
Title: A Good Investment
Body: Turkish towels are now my favorite kind of towel because they are very absorbent.  These towel were thick and have looked great for the past 20 washes.  The color is bright and has not faded.  My family has liked them.  We only have to remember to not use dryer sheet or fabric softener as per manufacturer's warning.  All of our other towels get both fabric softener and dryer sheets to keep them soft. I plan on replacing my other towels with these towels when it's time.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
Author: Sharnese L.
Title: BUYER BEWARE
Body: I literally just received my towels today!  I made a purchase of 5 other colors from another brand.  Thought that it would be great to wash ALL the towels before putting them in the linen closet!  WELP! Totally bled all my towels and the lint is horrible! Luckily I decided to split the load and wash my white towels separately! Please do not say it was the detergent because you can't get any better than the detergent that I use also, my washing machine has towel settings!  Terrible brand and such a waste of money and now my time that it takes to take photos and create this post!  Totally destroyed my beautiful pink towels from another brand, freaking lint EVERY WHERE.  Never again will I purchase from this company! TOTALLY PISSED RIGHT NOW!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Horrible lint!
Body: Worst towels ever.  I washed and dried them 3 times and they released so much lint it was unbelievable!  The lint shed onto ALL my other towels and ruined them too!  Everything covered in lint!  I tried to salvage them by rewashing and lint rolling them but it was a waste of time.  I threw these away and had to throw away my other towels too because they ruined a whole load’s worth of towels with massive lint.  Unbelievable!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2021
Author: Ash Finley
Title: Lint everywhere
Body: I got these and immediately washed and dried them. They are amazingly fluffy and soft. I was impressed but I just used the bath towel for the first time and I’m completely covered in lint. I’m so disappointed. I felt like it absorbed water super quick, but as I went to put lotion on after I dried, I felt the little balls of lint all over. I’m upset, covered in sticky lotion lint. And I don’t know if I can return these since I washed and used. I would skip. Unless they’re just for show…
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2021
Author: Merryliz
Title: Shedding
Body: I would of given these towels 5 stars, but after 4 washings, they still shed, and I am sick and tired of buying towels that keep doing this.  I wash my kitchen hand towels along with bath towels, and they are ruined from all the shedding.  Eventually I will probably buy egyptian towels, cause I have bought them in the past, and there was little or no shedding at all.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2020
Author: Ranger6
Title: Great, but a messy disaster. Please read
Body: Please note that all categories marked 1 star really were a 4-5 star. I marked 1 due to how horrible these are for lint. I have washed and dried a half dozen times now and am still cleaning washer basin, shaking off numerous pieces of lint and then having to sweep up, leaving lint all over bathtub when drying from showers, shaving, etc.Very thick, absorbent and soft from the get go just a annoying mess and additional cleaning.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2021
Author: Jake310SoCali
Title: Horrible…run while you have a chance!
Body: I was expecting a high or that soft comfort quality of dept store towels you get from Macy’s. Boy was I mistaken. When I first open the package I was already having doubts. The material is thin like and feels fake. After the first wash it looked like it was dragged thru the washer 10x and could not take the beating. I end up using it as towel for after washing my car, that’s how I feel about them. Sad. Get it and I’ll tell you now I told you so!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2020
Author: Wendy
Title: Do not really absorb water
Body: I am not entirely happy with them. Though they are very soft and the color doesn't come out when they wash, they are not really absorbent. It feels like they kind of push the water around instead of suck it up. If i use them to wipe my hands after washing my hands, i always have to wipe them away on my shirt or something because it just doesn't dry my hands entirely. A little disappointed about that but otherwise, they are pretty ok.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
Author: ks
Title: They are good towels, not great.
Body: These are soft and lovely towels, but their absorbency is not as great as I had hoped.  Even after washing and drying in the clothes dryer and then also drying by hanging on the clothesline, they are not as absorbent as I had hoped for.  The other thing that is disappointing, even though I was aware before I ordered, is that the decorative end is only on one end of the towel, not both.  That seems strange to me.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2021
Author: Patty
Title: Lint. EVERYWHERE.
Body: I do not understand all the positive reviews. These are the worst towels I have ever purchased.Issue #1. As the title suggests, these towels get lint absolutely everywhere. When you get out of the shower all clean the last thing you want is little black specs of lint all over you. None of my other towels do this. Even after 5 washes there is lint all over the bathtub after use.Issue #2: The towels are thin and feel like they could be sold at the dollar store.Issue #3: they do not absorb water well. At all. Kinda the main purpose of a towel.Issue #4: Have I mentioned lint LITERALLY everywhere whenever they are used?Final verdict is buy another set of towels. These areAwful.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
Author: Selena V
Title: Boooo they suck
Body: As a woman who applies lotion regularly, I found that drying my skin with this towels leave little fur balls of lint everywhere. My husband is a contact wearer and said he is having the same issue after drying his hands on these towels. No good. And after the first wash before use, they lost a lot of their color in places. Will order towels from Ikea like I initially wanted in the first place. Now I have useless towels.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2021
Author: Jin Tai
Title: They are not 40" x 80".
Body: I needed these for guests in my home when they use the sauna. I measured before and after following the instruction for washing. I expected a small shrinkage and it was OK.  If your going to sell something stating a size, be honest.  I could have purchased bath sheets locally that ended up the same size.  The material quality is good. But I won't be buying from this company again.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2021
Author: Bill
Title: Disappointed!
Body: When first received, the towels were everything as described: soft & plush, looked great. Then, it took a turn after the first wash. In the product video, it was mentioned that the amount of certain amount of lint would be found when washed. However, I noticed blue lint everywhere; in the washing machine, bathroom floor and shower as well as when I used it.  I washed (2) towel sets together five times. The attached pictures says it all. First pic, dry lint trap after washing #3. Second pic, after washing #5. Have resorted to using a lint brush after each washing to capture excess lint, which still does not solve the lint problem. I purchased because of the product description and product reviews (which majority are quite positive). Maybe it is an issue with quality control. Never purchase again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2021
Author: agk
Title: Pleased so far!
Body: I painted our master bed and bath so needed new towels to match. There are so many towels that just come in white and it was easy to find some in shades of grey or other neutral tones but not so easy to find tan shades. Therefore, I was very pleased to see the range of colors offered by American Linen. I ordered the tan color from them and another set from a different brand to see what matched best. The ones from American Linen were a perfect tone to compliment the paint color - not taupe, not yellow, not blue tones but just a very nice sand tone. I washed them first and dried with my wool dryer balls and they came out nice and soft. I have found them to be absorbent as well. They are new so hopefully I will also find they hold up well.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2021
Author: Cyn M
Title: Love this towel, but....
Body: So the towel itself is lovely!  I got the Turquoise Blue and it is such a great color!  The bath sheet is huge and absorbent...what's not to love?  That said, I am so happy I washed it alone the first time.  I put it in with a color absorbing paper and the paper was saturated with the color.  It was bleeding color the next two times I washed it as well.  I can't speak to the other colors, but if you are interested in this color, don't wash it with other items it could transfer color to.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2020
Author: sparran
Title: Cheaply made
Body: I did not have a good experience with this purchase. The picture of my washing machine is the 2nd time they were washed and the fraying is all around most edges. They bleed so bad I have to wash them separately which makes for an extra load each week. I always wash in cold water, gentle cycle. I had to throw away 2 prs of socks because of the lint. I can just imagine what my machine filter looks like.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
Author: Kristen Herriman
Title: Soft but non absorbent and lint EVERYWHERE!
Body: Got these on the Prime day deal and was excited. Washed them once per directions. Used them once... Did not absorb much and husband and I were COVERED in lint! Washed them  again per directions. Feeling hopeful... Were slightly more absorbent but once AGAIN covered in lint!! Total disappointment and I can't send them back. If you are reading this review, move along. These are not worth it unless you like to be covered in lint! One good thing: they ARE very soft.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Fuzzies EVERYWHERE
Body: Right out of the package, I was having doubts because I was expecting the towels to be way softer for it being "luxury" quality. I've bought way more inexpensive towels in the past for waaaay less. On top of the lack of softness, the towels gave off soooo much fuzzies. I've had to wash the towels 4 times and we are still finding black fuzzies all over our selves after getting out of the shower/washing our hands. I've had to continue to sweep the bathroom floor because there's little black fuzzies all over the floor. These towels are also not very absorbent.. I find myself toweling off and everything still feeling overly wet and damp. I was expecting a lot better for "amazons #1 best seller"!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2021
Author: R. H. Wood
Title: Turned dingy gray after several washings
Body: There were two things that I did not like. The first is that they turned very dingy gray after only a few washings. I bought white because I wanted white. The second thing I didn't like is that the design is on only one end of the towel, so when folding, one has to make sure the design is in the right place to ensure they are all folded the same way. Just kind'a a pain in the neck.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
Author: Amber Dixon
Title: Edges coming undone after initial wash
Body: They initially looked nice and are soft; however, after washing for the first time, threads are loose on the edges, making them look worn out. I followed the washing instructions provided in the packaging, including drying on low; however, they still came out looking ratty. Disappointed and would not recommend if you are looking for hand towels that may be viewed by guests.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2021
Author: J. Chase
Title: Worst towels EVER handsdown!
Body: These towels are horrible.  I wish we could return them but we ordered them prior to a move for a new house and we are beyond the timeframe for return.  These towels are super cheap and worst of all they discolor in spots and turn pink as of they were exposed to bleach--which they weren't.  We had to throw them all away.  What a waste of money!  Do not buy!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2020
Author: Jodie
Title: Do not recommend
Body: I am not sure how these towels received so many good reviews. They are not very thick at all and not very absorbent.  I washed them before use and was covered in lint when I did use them and so was my washer. I ended up washing them 3 times and still had lint in my washer/dryer and on me so I returned them. They are not good towels at all. They look good but if you actually plan on using them I would not recommend.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
Author: MICHAEL BRENNAN
Title: Not what I expected
Body: Sorry not what I expected.The towels do not feel like they are not absorbing the water and I don't feel like I am dry after taking a shower.It feels like there was too much fabric softener on them but we don't use that or even dryer sheets.My wife purchased a different manufacturers set at Kohl's and they are fantastic.Sorry
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2021
Author: George L.
Title: based on reviews I expected a better product
Body: I thought these would be a better value.  Admittedly, they were not a real expensive towel set, but even after following directions on washing and drying they did not 'fluff up' like was claimed. There was an unbelievable amount of lint in the dryer trap too.  They are about as good as a cheap Walmart set. Should be ok for car washing.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2021
Author: Kyle Anthony Smith
Title: Not worth it.
Body: Not worth it. SO MUCH DYE. Towels look super SUPER OLD after 1 wash in the washing machine & dryer, also snag very very easy. They are thick, soft and absorbent but still a waste - ended up going with a different brand after wasting an obnoxious amount of money on a set of black and purple towels & wash cloths from this company. Save your time and money.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2021
Author: Milo S
Title: Not absorbent
Body: If you want a soft towel, buy these. If you want an absorbent towel, do not buy these. I really wanted to like these towels but they simply don't do the job they are supposed to do. Your skin will still have a layer of wetness which I find super annoying and uncomfortable. Will be returning so I can't comment on durability.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2021
Author: Jason
Title: Released a LOT of Dye Over Multiple Washes
Body: I washed these and put them through 2 rinse cycles. After that, I tried to use them in the shower and they were releasing so much dye I could see it in my lather and the water going down the drain had a LOT of color in it too. I washed again with 2 more rinse cycles and it got a little bit better. After 2 more washes I think it has finally stopped. It took 4 washes with a total of 6 rinse cycles and multiple showers for the releasing of the dye to stop. Meanwhile it has stained some of my towels and my clothes hamper liner. There are much better products out there, don’t waste your time.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2021
Author: Brier
Title: I returned these
Body: I can’t attest to the absorbency or how they feel because I never ended up using them. These were labeled as a peach color and they’re closer to a salmon, even a bit on the bright side. I thought the color would be duller, but they were just too bright for what I wanted. I’m sure they’re nice quality though.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2021
Author: mada989
Title: Still shedding after 6 wash cycles
Body: Very soft at first but try using when wet and you’ll be left in a thick layer of fuzz. Even after wash cycle after wash cycle trying all the tricks i read on Google but leaves a huge messy trail of lint everywhere. Weird because the gray ones I bought are just fine but the black would not stop shedding
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2021
Author: Devil Ape
Title: Garbage
Body: I was excited for my towel set Isince they had good reviews and was on sale. I washed them before use of course and Total disappointment, all the towels leave so much lint. I dried myself after the showered and I had blue lint from head to toe causing me to rinse myself again. I tried to give them another chance thinking it was maybe the first try but nope same thing every time with all the towels. If you’re planing on buying these just throw your money in the trash basically the same thing
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
Author: Bethany
Title: Great Towels!
Body: It was hard to select towels online when I couldn't touch them.  These turned out to be thick and of good quality.  I am glad I washed them before I used them because a lot of lint ended up in the dryer's lint catcher.  I bought them several months ago and the color is not fading.  I still wash them seperatly because there is still a lot of lint.  I will buy these again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2021
Author: PIP
Title: Wouldn't buy again
Body: I have had the blue set for a month now & washed six times.  They are fairly soft & absorbent.  A little smaller than average bath towel, but adequate.  They are still "shedding".  When use end up with fuzz all over.  They have already faded, but are still bleeding.  When wring wash cloth, can see color running in sink.  Leaves all lint over face.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2021
Author: Piggles
Title: Too much fuzz
Body: I can’t even review the softness and absorbency of these towels because I’m so distracted by all the fuzz. I ordered the black. I’ve washed them twice but they’re still shedding. If we wash our hands (or face, body, etc) and use these to dry our skin, we end up coated with little black fuzzies.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
Author: Wendelin Keller
Title: Love this company's towels
Body: Thick and fluffy. wash separately or with like colors if you get a strong color (common sense)be aware that the largest towel sizes they sell are over 6ft long and are likely larger than you expected. Unless you are looking for a luxury beach towel ;p. the 2nd largest size is the ample queen sized towel
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2021
Author: M. Jones-Rice
Title: If you want to permanently stain your bathtub or shower floor, this is for you
Body: I purchased the red washcloths for use while in shower and bathtub. Red dye on these is really intense. Washed numerous times and dye still bled while using. White porcelain is now permanently stained. Wonder what it did to my skin. That’s really not a good thing. Inexcusable for a towel.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2021
Author: L. Baldwin
Title: Disappointed
Body: This towel is not soft upon opening the package.  It was not soft after washing - and using laundry softener.  It is not fluffy and I suspect, not particularly absorbent.  It felt no different to the touch than the one I had planned to replace.  I think I may well return it...It is a nice size.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2021
Author: L. O'Neill
Title: Cautiously optimistic
Body: Positive: These towels are huge. This large size is what I wanted. They also feel soft and thick, not cheap, not rough, not flimsy.Negative: I washed them upon arrival and they came out of the dryer with some pulls. Kind of annoying. Also, they’re all white, but not the same white.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2021
Author: Lorrie Tschaenn
Title: Very soft and thick
Body: Love the thickness and I was sent a email stating to wash in warm water before using ( which I wash everything that's new) they are absolutely correct 😀 I had to purchase more. Love all the colors etc. They are very nice and very affordable. You will enjoy. Made very well  . Thank you
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Calidad vs precio no es buena
Body: Recibí un correo por parte del vendedor instruyendo que lavara las toallas antes de su uso, así lo hice, en realidad no absorben nada, uno trata de secarse y no pasa nada, se sienten dura como si fueran viejas y el grosor muy fino. No parecen una toalla de calidad de hotel como la describían. No me siento satisfecha con la compra
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2021
Author: m.cox
Title: Best wash cloths you can get online
Body: I have ordered several of these wash cloths.  After multiple washing cycles, they still hold up, are absorbent, soft, perfect size, no lint, and nothing scratchy on them.  I also have these in pistachio.  The green holds it color well and does not release dye in the water.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2021
Author: Portia Janea
Title: It’s so fluffy I’m going to die!!!
Body: I ordered two in gray. The color is so rich, it’s perfect! They were big and fluffy even before I washed them but afterwards they were like clouds that dropped down out of the sky! It’s heavenly to get out of a hot shower and wrap up in one like a big, fluffy, Turkish cotton burrito! I’m planning on buying a couple each week to stock up!
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2021
Author: Peter Evans
Title: Good towels in most ways except ......
Body: Liked these towels and bought 3 sets in different colors.Good quality, impressive choice of colors and nice sizes.Disappointed with the absorbency. Some reviewers hoped the absorbency might improve after many washings. I hope so too.Otherwise a good purchase at a good price.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2020
Author: Jen
Title: Worst towels ever! Too much lint.
Body: Absolutely the worst towels I have ever purchased. I have washed them five times before using and still ended up with so much black lint in me I had to take a second shower to wash it off then use and old reliable towel. As you can see from the pics, the lint just doesn’t stop. I’ve even lint rolled the towels and still they are horrible. Do NOT buy these towels.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2021
Author: Howard Hotard
Title: Pile is too high
Body: While they are soft the pile is cut too high. Good maybe for a baby. Usually on good washcloths the pile is shorter on one side of the cloth thus allowing for a deeper cleaning. The pile on this washcloth is way too long. I can't really recommend this washcloth unless you are using it on babies.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2021
Author: V. Habben
Title: Don’t get grey
Body: I replaced all my towels with these & they’re fantastic but something is definitely wrong with the grey color.  I washed each color separately & every load came out perfect except for the grey where the color seemed to come out of the wash cloths, hand towels & bath towels.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2021
Author: V. Habben
Title: Pick a different color
Body: I replaced all my towels with these & they’re fantastic but something is definitely wrong with the grey color.  I washed each color separately & every load came out perfect except for the grey where the color seemed to come out of the wash cloths, hand towels & bath towels.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2021
Author: V. Habben
Title: Get a different color
Body: I replaced all my towels with these & they’re fantastic but something is definitely wrong with the grey color.  I washed each color separately & every load came out perfect except for the grey where the color seemed to come out of the wash cloths, hand towels & bath towels.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2021
Author: Kathy
Title: Soooo Soooofffft!!
Body: I LOVE these towels, I'm already planning on getting more. I have washed them a few times already, I have not seen any threads fall out, and they have remained soft and comfortable, which is important for me having eczema that affects my hands. They have great absorbancy, I can pat my hands and legs once and all the moisture is absorbed. A great purchase.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2020
Author: Jen W.
Title: On the small side and still shedding
Body: I’m really frustrated with these towels.  I’ve washed them 5-6 times and they are STILL shedding and leaving tons of lint in the dryer.  The large towels are also significantly smaller than my last set of towels and barely wrap around my body (I’m not a large woman).  They are soft and haven’t lost their color, but I won’t ever buy these again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2021
Author: Katenkat
Title: The Best!
Body: I am so happy with my purchases from this company!  I got the the washcloths first, and liked them so much that I ordered the bath, hand and washcloth package.  These are soft, wash and dry well and are the most absorbent towels I have ever purchased...I highly recommebd!
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sage Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2020
Author: Mr King
Title: Factory Needs to Prewash
Body: I have never laundered anything that shed so much fiber. Its clear to me that these are minimally washed after production. 5 of these towels filled my lint trap twice with luxurious blankets of fuzz, twice! 2nd wash was a little better.These towels would easily get 4 stars but i noted some discolorations and pulled fiber (runners) after first wash.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
Author: Sonja Stalions
Title: Poor quality is the reason they are on sale
Body: As instructed I washed the towel set prior to use.  After just that one wash the trim on the end of one of the bath towels ripped and came loose.  An INCREDIBLE amount of lint came off the towel in the washer and when put in the dryer the lint clogged the filter.  I decided to wash the set again to remove more lint.  After the second wash the color was beginning to fade off the edges of the hand towels and again when dried a huge amount of lint came off the towels.  I wouldn't buy them again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2021
Author: Anna
Title: Plush, No Shedding, but Color Issues
Body: Total bang for your buck for softness and NO SHEDDING, even after just my first wash. Was very impressed until I noticed some slight color issues.. I got the dark grey color and there seems to be some “pinkish” coloration in some spots. It’s subtle but noticeable.. almost as if a tiny bit of bleach got into the wash, but I know that wasn’t the case. Other colors might fair better, but if you don’t mind just a very slight discoloration in some spots, then these super soft, fluffy, no shed towels and the ones for you!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2021
Author: Rhianna
Title: Its not worth it.
Body: I wanted to give these the benefit of the doubt but like other reviews half of the towels have turned colors I have washed them over six times and they are still releasing Fuzzy's all over, the strings are coming undone from the stitching for the price I thought it was a good idea but in the long run it's better to pay more for better quality this was a waste of money I have to buy new towels only one month of having these
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2021
Author: KEE@NC
Title: Best towels ever!
Body: I’ve been on the search for the perfect towel for far too long and have finally succeeded! This towels are soft, absorbent and do not shed. They’re very large and super luxurious. Of course I will be buying more, purchasing them as gifts and recommending them to everyone.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2021
Author: Calvary
Title: Affordable but Cheap
Body: Washed on warm, dried on low heat as instructed. I’m not surprised by the lint as that’s standard fare with new towels. I am surprised to find the threads pulled in various places on the towel. They’re also not very soft and quite thin, but just as absorbent as the IKEA towels I was trying to replace. I’m going to look for something else.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
Author: cafejacque
Title: Nice towels, Decent Price
Body: I washed them three times, warm water with a couple of Color Care Sheets when I first got them. These are black towels so they will always bleed a little in the wash so always wash them separately or with like color. They hang on the towel rack nicely. I am pleased with my purchase.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2020
Author: Zepita
Title: False Advertising 100 percent Cotton Not!.
Body: I bought these towels thinking that people are contentious about what they sell. Sometimes, a bit more money is worth paying for good products. At times there is a great price for good quality, these are the people I will always buy from. Do not buy these towels, the quality is cheap and the product is not 100% cotton as they claim.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
Author: Heidi
Title: great towel
Body: I ordered the 35 x 70 for taking to the Athletic Club.  The towel is very soft and although I haven't used it yet  - I can tell that it is going to be absorbent.  It has a wonderful luxurious feel to it.  I'm ordering two more so I can have a rotation of them.
Style: Size: 35x70'' Jumbo Bath Towel | Color: Malibu Peach

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2020
Author: Paul Silverstein
Title: Good towels
Body: The towels are soft and absorbent, and after a second wash they appear to be slightly more fluffy. I was satisfied enough to purchase a second set of a different color.One thing I see often with dyed towels, especially the wash cloths is you can see color in the sink water basin after you ring it out a few times. This typically disappears after several washings and uses.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2021
Author: Ceedub
Title: Terrible Towels
Body: These towels are not absorbent!  Now, the color has faded in spots. I followed the directions and that accomplished absolutely nothing.  So disappointed--especially in light of the claims. My second worst purchase on Amazon.  I would not purchase these ever!
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2021
Author: Alice S.
Title: Lint and more Lint!
Body: Nice towels nice color, all ready had 4 washes and low drying, and I haven't even used them. There is so much lint coming off these towels, I don't even want to use them . I thought they would be good absorbed towels , the lint that comes off these towels is alot. Disappointed.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2021
Author: Matthew Lambertson
Title: Fluffffffy
Body: I bought these to be sweat towels (probably not the intended usage *shrug*) and I wanted something that would be highly absorbent and at least slightly comfortable. They do a great job. I was pleasantly surprised at how they maintained their fluffiness after the first wash.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
Author: Mike G
Title: Great washcloth.  Large and soft.
Body: Not sure if my old ones started this way but these are awesome.  Large 13x13 and very soft and great for showering with gel as they hold it and make lots of lather.  Just started using these so can't comment on longevity or durability but they are great right out of the gate!
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2021
Author: Gretchen
Title: Definitely not oversized
Body: I expected these to be larger than they are as well as better quality than they are.  They're comparable to a cheap set you can get at Walmart.  The threading does not feel soft, even when washed with fabric softener.  I wish I spent a bit more on a better quality set.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2021
Author: kellpaluga
Title: Love it for a blanket, not a towel.
Body: When I received this towel I was impressed! It was thick and soft. The reviews I read said that you needed to wash it a few times before using it. So I washed and dried it three times in one of those washes was on hot. It still doesn't dry you off. It just pushes the water around on your body. I'm going to wash it a couple more times and see if I can't get it to work
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Sky Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2021
Author: Holly
Title: Go ahead! Just do it! These will be the best towels you've used.
Body: I decided after all these years to finally get rid of my old every day towels and replace them with these. I am so glad I did. They washed up beautifully and as fluffy as described. The softness is beyond belief. I would highly recommend these towels and this seller to everyone.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2020
Author: Uncle Skinny
Title: Amazon's product description is not 100% by any means
Body: I bought two sets of these dark brown towels for traveling purposes and upon initial opening they appeared to be what I ordered. Unfortunately after usage I discovered that (1) towel fibers were unraveling and (2) when wringing out the washcloth, the clarity of the rinse water continues to be a light brown, indicating the product dying is of very poor quality. I will continue to use these but highly recommend to anyone it would be best to purchase towels locally at a store. That way you know what quality you are receiving.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2021
Author: Emily
Title: Won’t stop shedding
Body: I really like these towels, great color and SUPER soft and absorbent. But I gave 2 stars because after 2 months and several washings they’re still leaving a lot of fuzz all over me, my bathroom and the washer & dryer. Multiple times a day I have to dust a layer of navy blue fuzz off my white tub & sink, and I’m always covered in fuzz after using them. Seems like they shed worse somehow after washing too.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2021
Author: JD
Title: Terrible product
Body: Have washed these towels three times.  All three times the washing machine was left with a layer of lint.  Three times in dryer resulted in three full lint filters.  Just not going for a fourth washing.  Never tried using them.  Don't want my bathroom or my family covered in lint.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
Author: Carol Seawright
Title: Soft, Absorbent & Great Value
Body: Sure you could buy softer and more absorbent towels at a greater price, but these towels are very soft and absorbent and have held up to many, many washes.  They just keep getting better!  I would purchase again.  Not top of the line, but a top choice for me!
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2021
Author: Yolanda Brown
Title: The color is not a bright white as noted in the description.
Body: The color is not a bright white as noted in the description. The cloths have a gray to blue tint.  White clothes are usually purchased because we will want to bleach them to keep them bright and white.  The care instructions advise-"Do not bleach".
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2021
Author: Mikey B
Title: Very nice oversized towels
Body: Followed the sellers instructions about washing first and color is fast and size is great.  We love these.  Ordered 2 of the 40 x 80 to cover chairs and sofa in RV to protect against wet suits and sand.  Great solution and product.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Sand Taupe

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2020
Author: MMIB
Title: Not all Turkish
Body: I bought the 4 tool set and they match. The 2 larger towels I bought in addition as I was so happy but they are NOT THE SAME. It’s so disappointing to pay $30 for a towel that is sub par. The 2 large towels are NOTLUXURY OR PREMIUM.  I would return but I washed first before using. Would NOT RECOMMEND. They also arrived different days in different shipments. I wish I had reviews before I purchased. How do you return towels?.?
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2021
Author: Diane
Title: Beautiful and Thick
Body: These face cloths are large, very soft and thick. They are not lightweight when wet because they are very absorbent and do a great job of face/body-washing. I really like the vivid golden yellow color and the way they look in my bathroom.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2021
Author: Crystal Stewart
Title: Towel fuzz all over you
Body: After several washes, these towels keep shedding and shedding. We can't even use them. And it covers all the other clothing we wash with it in black fuzz. The only good thing you'll get from these towels is an extraordinary amount of lint to start a fire.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2021
Author: John neri
Title: Extremely soft. Must. wash first in warm water
Body: Love the softness.  Easy on face especially.Wipes sweat off easily. I perform on stage and move around a lot. They were the best I have ever used to wipe sweat off my face.Very light weight for a plush hand towel.Will buy more.Great price for 6 hand towels at that quality.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2021
Author: E. George
Title: It is not 40x80. Label & measurement is 30x70
Body: Color is good. It is also soft and absorbent. The complaint I have is I purchased a 40” x 80” bath sheet and instead received a 30” x 70” sheet.Had I known, I would have probably purchased a different brand — one which was less expensive.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2021
Author: Cajun country
Title: Missing wash cloths
Body: I love the bath and hand towel. However I ordered and paid for a six piece set. Two bath, two hand, and two wash cloths. NO wash cloths .I washed them immediately not realizing the wash cloths were missing. They wash perfectly! No fade, noe pilling or loose threads at all.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sky Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2021
Author: Flreinig
Title: These towels are the BOMB!
Body: I fell in love bath sheets many years ago. I've had many sets,  but none compare to these. My husband is 6'2 and this towel hides him. The towels are thick, absorbent, and soft! We love them! They were more expensive than the others I've purchased,  but absolutely worth the money.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2021
Author: Guido M
Title: Doesn't maintain color
Body: These towels are soft but still don't absorb that well. The worst thing about these towels is that they do not hold their color. After one washing the originally dark gray showed signs of fading and looked almost deep purple in areas. I would not buy these towels.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2021
Author: Susan S
Title: Wonderful towels
Body: These are the most wonderful towels I have ever used, anywhere, hands down. I ordered the turquoise, they are beautiful. I have washed them several times and they get softer with each wash. I have already ordered another set for the other bathroom. They are a high quality Turkish threads made in Turkey. I will seek these towels out when I need more. The design is NOT at both ends on any piece. They are well made and should last a long time.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2021
Author: Rusty Yonkers
Title: Awesome large bath towel!!
Body: I am a big guy (6'6" tall and somewhat girthy). It is so nice to have a towel that will wrap around all of me with some to spare. And it is large enough that I can truly dry off after a shower. It is very thick and so soft. Amazing!
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2021
Author: suenosdeuomi
Title: Dull Purple Color
Body: While I was pleased with the first purple towel, the second one I just received, washed in mild soap like the first one, arrived in a dull purple, disappointing. Not pleased with the grayish tone, I will not buy more.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2021
Author: Rolfathan
Title: It was falling apart out of the package.
Body: It was falling apart out of the package. Fraying. Yeah, their "quality control" doesn't exist.EDIT: It's been a few week, and the thing is fraying on corners in multiple spots. This feels like some kind of joke.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
Author: Judy S.
Title: The towels are too linty!
Body: I bought these for my son for his college dorm room and make sure we washed them before he used them. They left our dryer filled with lint like I’ve never seen it before. Once he got to college and took his first shower there was lint all over his body. He hates them and had us replace them with towels from home. I regret buying them.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2021
Author: Stephanie C
Title: Leaves traces of lint on body, dye bleeds from fabric, and non absorbent
Body: If you don’t mind black fuzz on your face, than these are the towels for you! Almost ZERO absorbency and black lint that adheres to your body. I do not recommend. Returning Monday e for a refund. Gross.Also the dye BLEEDS EVERYWHERE. see pic. It’s disgusting.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2021
Author: Meria
Title: Just perfect!!!!
Body: Thank you American Soft Linen Company! This is precisely as you stated only better. I love them! Family and friends always comment on them too. I always tell  them if you order from “American Soft Linen” tell them I sent ya!😉
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Turquoise Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2021
Author: Anna
Title: They fall apart
Body: I was a little skeptical before purchasing after reading mixed reviews. I took a leap of faith and got them anyway because I have been wanting a soft, black towel set and these were a great price. My first initial thought after receiving the towels was "these are so soft." I was so excited to have these towels in my new apartment. I followed the washing directions as described on the tag. They shed like a dog after the first wash. I have been having to pick out towel chucks from my washer. I want to like these towels so bad because they would be perfect if there wasn't chunks falling out of them. Perhaps I will try to wash them once more but I'm not very hopeful.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2021
Title: Luxurious
Body: These face clothes are so soft, absorbent and luxurious. I bought 2 sets and glad that I did. These would also make excellent gifts for a house warming, wedding, Christmas, you name it. The recipient would think you spent a lot more than you actually did.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Burgundy Red

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2021
Author: Don B.
Title: Just OK
Body: These towels were very highly rated and the instructions on first use and care were spot on, they just weren't quite as luxurious as I expected nor were they very absorbent, but for $40 I guess they were OK. It appears that I will have to spend more to get super lux!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2021
Author: Julie
Title: Really Nice Towels!
Body: I had to find a replacement quickly for my guest bath after one towel mysteriously disappeared (teenagers) and was pleasantly surprised by the quality of these towels.  They are soft and absorbent, and perfect color match so I can use them with the other "orphan" bath, hand towels and washcloths.  Have washed them twice so far and color holds well.  Would definitely order again!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2020
Author: Linda S
Title: Soft or Not
Body: The towels are pretty, but not very soft,  I have both more expensive turkish towels and now i see the big difference, I will not be buying anymore of these towels because they are not quality material,  Remember you get pretty much want you pay for!!  But not bad for the price,
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2021
Author: GW
Title: Just Weird…Terrible
Body: A towel that feels wet even when it’s dry.As soon as you start drying off the towel feels wet…like your drying off with a wet towel. Worst towel ever. Don’t know how to describe it. I would not buy any more of these.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Dark Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
Author: Kenneth Bird
Title: Very thick and absorbent
Body: I'm very happy with these towels.  They're very thick and absorbent and very comfortable.  The last set of towels I purchased came from a big department store chain and were much thinner.  These are far superior.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2021
Author: LM
Title: Great Purchase
Body: These towels are very soft and gentle on the skin.  They are a great value for the money that I ordered  4 sets of these towels, my family really love them.  This was a great purchase and I will definitely order more towels.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Chocolate Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2021
Author: Shannon Wilson
Title: I feel like Big Bird
Body: I purchased two colors, both colors are beautiful and exactly what I wanted. But the yellow sheds terribly and does not absorb water. Before you ask I do not use fabric softener or dryer sheets in my towels. I've washed several times and it's not improving. The other color from same company does not have the same issue.
Style: Size: 3 Piece Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2021
Author: Greg F.
Title: Very nice
Body: I don't know if the people complaining on here have washers with razor blades, but I've washed these several times now with no fraying and they're still very soft... very big (which I like), but very soft
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2020
Author: Alessandra
Title: Towel dye is worst quality
Body: These towels look nice, but the dye is extremely cheap!  The gray towels will change colors in one wash using the most gentle laundry detergent, and the white towels have a hint of purple to the hue (straight out of the box).  Overall not impressed with the color quality of these towels.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2021
Author: Felicia S.
Title: Towels are Soft
Body: I transition my bathroom towels to all white. These towels are very soft and in the end very absorbent. I washed them once and they still shed while drying off. You have to give it a few washes and I use vinegar in the fabric softener.  After a few washes, they were great. Great value for the price and my guests love them.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2021
Author: Amazon customer

The other photo shows where the seam along the edge of one washcloth has failed and is falling apart. I want to return these.

The sizes are different too. You can find these poor-quality towels in Burlington factory for 1/2 the price.

I washed them before using, but the fabric pieces were still coming off and my face is really sensitive and allergic to dust, etc, so it made my face itch and it felt like there was dust on it. I think, if you are not like me, it whould work because the fabric is super soft.

Author: you better believe it

Author: Gregory G. Smith

Despite these 2 issues, I love how lightweight, soft and absorbent they are. Plus they dry pretty quickly. They are now the towels we use when camping in our RV.

I have put these towels through a wash and dry cycle 10 times, but the lose fibers are endless. And the towels look raggedy as can be without any use. I am extremely disappointed as I purchased 4 sets. I definitely would NOT recommend these towels. BUYER BEWARE.

Body: If you're Frodo and just got done throwing the one ring to rule them all, into the Mount Doom and need to wipe your hands, buy this wash cloths. If you're a normal human being of the homo sapien genus, buy larger towels so you can actually wipe your hands. I'd return these Hobbit hand towels but I don't want to be black listed by Amazon and have to buy stuff from an actual store and get the "rona", like most of the peasants.

Author: Kathleen McGee
Title: Simply amazing!  update!
Body: Simply amazing!  I bought these washcloths in navy blue for my daughter. I open the box and was extremely pleased with how thick and luxurious these washcloths were. Great size, beautiful color and extremely soft! Now, I am shopping for towels for myself and bath sheets. The colors are beautiful. I can’t wait to get them home and use them. Definitely, definitely buy All of your towels, washcloths and bath sheets from American soft linen!OMG!!!!  I just received my bath sheets and my six piece set of sky blue towels!!!!  ABSOLUTELY HEAVENLY!  LOOK NO FARTHER BECAUSE IT WILL BE A WASTE OF YOUR TIME! BEAUTIFUL COLOR, EXTREMELY SOFT, EXCELLENT QUALITY AND A PRICE YOU WILL NEVER FIND FOR THESE OUTSTANDING TOWELS!  EVERYONE,  BUY, BUY, BUY!
Style: Size: 4 Piece Washcloth Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2021
Author: Monica Mehta
Title: Fluffy, absorbent towels hold up in washing machine
Body: I’ve had this towel set for many months now and absolutely love it. The towels are fluffy, absorbent, the perfect size. They have been through many warm-water machine washes and the dryer and they are still fluffy and comfy, and they haven’t lost their lovely color. I just ordered 2 more sets. Highly recommend!
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Rockridge Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2021
Author: Brittany Ann Corbet
Title: Super soft but discolored out of the packaging!
Body: I got these towels as a gift and was really excited to throw away my old towels and replace them with these. I took them out of the packaging and noticed they are super soft! Unfortunately, I also noticed that the large towels were stained and discolored. It looked like they had a run in with some bleach. Nothing was wrong with either the washcloths or hand towels, just the bath towels were messed up.I threw them into the wash by themselves to see if the discoloration might be a temporary dye issue but that didn't change anything. I'm ready disappointed that these great towels are ruined right out of the package. I tried contacting the seller but didn't get a response.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Dye isn't set, color continues to bleed after 6 months of use
Body: Towel set was a gift. The absorbency, softness, and value were great. However, color continues to bleed from towels and wash cloths even after 6 months of use. Several attempts to set the color dye, unsuccessful. Color bleed is so bad from the towels and wash cloths that they have to be washed and dried separately from all other laundry. Once the wash cloths are wet, the color runs...leaving a trail of blue dye. Do not buy
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
Author: Appledoodle
Title: Defective - color washed out!
Body: Color washed out in patches after only one wash.  Used regular detergent and cold water.  I was also disappointed that the towels were a little smaller and thinner than any other towels I own, though they did feel very soft.  Returned for credit.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Colonial Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2020
Author: Deadpool
Title: Zero stars
Body: If I could give these no stars I would.  They never and I mean never stopped shedding.  After the 8th wash and sweeping up little blue fuzz from the shower, floor, sink and our skin.....I gave up and threw them away.  I was so angry I did not think to return them.  Save your money.

The pictures are after ten washes and the towels are now faded but lint is still falling out. I am definitely throwing them out. You are better off getting towels from Walmart.

Title: they look nice. And the color is beautiful
Body: I mean, they look nice. And the color is beautiful. I got them for our guest bathroom and decided to give one a try. I was surprised it doesn't really absorb water, and the water it does absorb seems to take forever to dry. They're about as absorbent as a sarong! My $3 towels from Fred Meyer suddenly seemed luxurious and and super absorbent. They're just not for me. Next time I am buying towels at the store so I can feel them. Very disappointed because there are so many good reviews.  Feels like a waste of money. Now do I subject my guests to this?

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2021
Author: Spooky
Title: These towels are AWESOME.
Body: I absolutely love these towels. They are so soft and extremely absorbent. My husband refuses to use any other towel than these now! :P They do shed, as others have mentioned, but as long as you follow the directions to wash them by themselves, you won't have any issues later on. Once you wash them a couple of times, they don't shed nearly as bad, if at all. We went back and ordered another set, along with a set of hand towels and wash cloths. I love using these wash cloths to wash my face. They are so so soft and plush. We will be buying more down the road for sure.
Style: Size: 4 Piece Bath Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2021
Author: C
Title: Average at best
Body: By far not the best towel I've ever bought as some have claimed. They're about what I'd expect for this price range and at that they maybe over priced. The best towels I've ever bought came from an upscale hardware store that you usually find in malls. Those towels cost quite a bit but worth it. I'll never buy these again.After four washings the towels are still shedding lint.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2021
Author: Redbird
Title: Awesome linen for a low price
Body: I had it with my old towels, didn't take long before they were unraveling in the wash.  I replaced them with these towels by American soft linen and absolutely love them!  Simply follow the instructions (wash first in warm water) and they fluff up and are great bath towels.  So far I really love them - they are as described and I would buy them again.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2021
Author: Book Girl
Title: Not thick, absorbent towels
Body: Towel are a bright Lemmon color, soft to the touch, but the absorbency is off the mark. I’d return if I had not already used snd washed/dried hoping that the towels would have better absorbency. Sort of disappointed.I will not purchase bath towels online again. I will have to see and feel the quality in person before purchasing.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2021
Author: Jennifer Heilgeist
Title: Amazing Towel
Body: My daughter and I are a bit larger than the rest of our family. Everybody else can wrap a towel around themselves and walk about if they need to, like say they forget something in the other room. My daughter almost cried because this is the first time she could wrap a towel around herself completely (That she can remember). They are very soft. I followed the instructions and washed and dried the towel before trying it.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Violet Purple

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
Author: Christiana Klatt
Title: Leaves behind some fine...stuff...on your skin
Body: It took a month, but the towel finally stopped shedding what seemed like dust. I would dry myself off (after washing it twice before I used it) and when I would brush my hand over my skin it was like a poof of dust came off. Not dust, obviously, but whatever it is I've never had anything that fine left on my skin from a towel before. I assume this is good quality for the price, but it was annoying.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Bright White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2021
Author: Scoober
Title: This towel is my life now.
Body: Oh my god, I can't state enough how much I love this giant towel. I got it in yellow and haven't had any trouble yet with lint or color running, but I did have to run it twice in the dryer after washing it the first time, since you're supposed to dry it on low. It's not as soft as I thought it would be, but it's still more than soft enough. It's nice and thick, it's very absorbent, and most importantly, it completely wraps around my big fat body and then some, lol. I wanted a BIG towel, I received a BIG towel, and I couldn't be happier with it.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Lemon Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2021
Author: Bruce B
Title: Good for warm climes.
Body: I enjoy the softness of these towels. They are neither plush nor thick. I am using them in my year round warm climate home. I would find them not to my liking if I had them in my seasonally cool/cold home. I am 5’9” about 170 lbs and prefer a thicker and larger size for colder environments.
Style: Size: 6 Piece Towel Set | Color: Sand Taupe

So, I use them anyway.  They are great, soft and absorbent, they just have discoloring from that initial wash.  I wish I could give then higher marks, but I can't because they discolored right away!

Title: Not really lint free
Body: These are lovely fluffy towels with a lot of lint.  After 6 washings, I am still finding little pieces of red lint on me after I dry off.  I love everything about them, but the lint.  I will stick to the better homes and gardens towel I bought from Walmart since they are cheaper and have less lint.Update:  These towels have been washed 9 times and are still leaving lint everywhere.  After drying, I have to remove a lot of lint.  I have newer seen so much.  This was a complete waste of money for unusable towels.  These were supposed to be lint free!!

Author: MrsPink
Title: Love It!
Body: Absolutely Love it!! I bought this towel for my daughter. She’s heavy set. So normal sized towel don’t quite wrap around her properly. So I bought her one of these. It’s a great size. It wraps around her with lots to spare. She feels much more comfortable going from the shower to her bedroom. Before she’d wrap herself in 2 towels. Just to make sure she was covered. Because like me. She doesn’t like getting dressed in the hot bathroom with damp skin. It’s nice to wrap it around you and wait for your skin to dry. Is Soft and Thick as well. And the colour is so vibrant. I want one for myself now. Plan to purchase one for myself in the near future. Highly recommend.
Style: Size: 40x80'' Oversized Bath Towel | Color: Lemon Yellow

Title: Huge towel

This would be great to cozy wrap around yourself after a bath or great beach towel option!The quality seems wonderful so far (even after washing). I have had them for about a month and will update this if anything changes! Great gift idea to by a pair of these towels for his and hers towels :)
